summary: 4.8 发票4.8 Invoice除非另有书面约定，客户可就已实际产生并支付的推广服务费，根据平台公布的开票规则，申请开具发票。Unless otherwise agreed in writing, the Customer may apply for an invoice in accordance with the invoicing rules published on the OESA p
text: 4.8 发票4.8 Invoice除非另有书面约定，客户可就已实际产生并支付的推广服务费，根据平台公布的开票规则，申请开具发票。Unless otherwise agreed in writing, the Customer may apply for an invoice in accordance with the invoicing rules published on the OESA platform for the Promotion Service Fee that have actually been incurred and paid.

page_name: 巨量千川数据推广服务协议
title: 4.9退款​
page_url: 总知识库_cleaned/抖音电商规则中心/生态角色/巨量千川/巨量千川数据推广服务协议.html
summary: 这是一份关于退款规则的说明，主要内容包括：客户需满足一定条件才能申请退款，如无在投计划、填写退款申请文件、无未处理的事宜等；退款金额将退还至客户指定账户，如有特殊情况将告知客户；客户在申请退款时可以选择是否关户，关户后退款完成后将无法使用该账户。同时，平台将对巨量千川账户执行临时限制措施以核实退款金额。如因客户账户信息错误导致退款不成功，公司不承担责任。
text: 4.9退款4.9 Refund（1）客户可申请对数据推广账户内现金部分剩余款项（客户预付款和全部续费的总额扣减已经发生的全部服务费总额以及应扣费用后的余额）进行退款，但需同时满足下列条件：（a）账户内无在投计划；（b）按照系统和本公司要求填写退款申请文件；（c）没有任何未处理完毕的事宜，包括但不限于违规赔偿、违约赔偿或投诉纠纷;（d）数据推广账户中的非现金部分（包括但不限于赠款）不可退款；（e）客户申请退费的金额已经开具过纸质发票的，客户应根据税收相关法律法规配合退回已开具的发票或按照申请退费金额提供《开具红字增值税专用发票信息表》。（1）The Customer may apply for a refund of the remaining cash amount in the data promotion account (the balance after the total amount of the Customer’s advance payment and full renewal is deducted from the total amount of all service fees that have occurred and expenses that should be deducted). However, the following conditions shall be met: (a) No ongoing promotion orders under the OESA Account; (b) Fill in the refund application documents as required by the system and the Company; (c) There are no unsettled matters, including but not limited to compensation for violation of rules, compensation for breach of contract or complaint and dispute; (d) Non-cash portion in the data promotion account (including but not limited to grants) is non-refundable; (e) If a paper invoice has been issued for the amount applied for refund by the Customer, the Customer shall return the issued invoice in accordance with relevant tax laws and regulations, or provide theInformation Form for the Issuance of Special Red-Letter Value-Added Tax Invoicesaccording to the applied amount of refund.（2）为对退款金额进行核实和计算，巨量千川平台将在客户提交退款申请后至退款流程完成期间，对客户的巨量千川账户执行临时限制措施。客户可在申请退款时选择是否关户，客户应仔细阅读并同意《退款前须知》，并根据系统和公司要求提交退款资料。如客户选择退款并关户，退款完成后，客户的巨量千川账户将被执行限制措施（包括但不限于投放限制、禁用或注销），客户将无法使用该账户。本公司在收到客户退款资料后30个工作日内将退款金额退还到客户指定账户，如有特殊情况需要延期，本公司将告知客户。因客户账户信息错误导致退款不成功的，本公司不承担任何责任。（2）To verify and calculate the refund amount, OESA Platform will implement temporary Restrictive Measures on the Customer’s OESA Account after the refund application is submitted and before completion of the refund process. The Customer may choose whether to close the OESA Account when submitting the refund application. The Customer should carefully read and agree to the "Refund Notice " and submit refund materials according to online instructions and offline requirements by OESA. If the Customer chooses to refund and close OESA Account,Restrictive Measures (including but not limited to restricting the placement of promotion orders, blocking or closing the Account) will be imposed on the Customer’s OESA Account after the refund process is completed, and the Customer will not be able to use the Account.The Company will return the refund amount to the account designated by the Customer within 30 working days after receiving the refund information from the Customer. In case of any special circumstances that require extension, the Company will inform the Customer.The Company shall not be liable for failure of refund due to incorrect account information of the Customer.

page_name: 巨量千川数据推广服务协议
title: 5.1 提交​
page_url: 总知识库_cleaned/抖音电商规则中心/生态角色/巨量千川/巨量千川数据推广服务协议.html
summary: 这是一份规定客户提交数据推广内容的相关条款，明确客户需以明示或默示方式提交，且一旦提交不可变更，除非在特定数据推广产品规则下可变更，需提前合理期间提交变更后的版本。同时，客户方数据推广内容及其规格、尺寸、格式等需符合公司以及流量媒体方的规定。
text: 5.1 提交5.1 Submission（1）客户应当以明示或默示方式，线上提交或确认客户方数据推广内容。客户方数据推广内容一经提交，未经本公司同意，不可变更。如客户方数据推广内容在特定数据推广产品规则下可变更，客户应当提前合理期间提交变更后的版本至本公司和/或流量媒体方。（1）The Customer shall submit or confirm the Customer's Marketing Materials online, explicitly or implicitly. Once submitted, the Customer's Marketing Materials shall not be adjusted without the consent of the Company. If the Customer's Marketing Materials are adjustable under the rules of certain data promotion products, the Customer shall submit the updated version to the Company and/or the Traffic Media.（2）客户方数据推广内容及其规格、尺寸、格式等应当符合本公司以及流量媒体方的规定。（2）The Customer shall make sure the Customer's Marketing Materials and the specifications, sizes, formats, etc. Comply with the regulations of the Company and the Traffic Media Providers.

page_name: 巨量千川数据推广服务协议
title: 5.2 审核​
page_url: 总知识库_cleaned/抖音电商规则中心/生态角色/巨量千川/巨量千川数据推广服务协议.html
summary: 本公司有权审核客户方数据推广内容，基于法律法规和服务协议制定审核规则，有权自行决定是否披露及具体方案。审核范围仅限于合法性形式审查，如链接是否能在终端设备上成功展示，不负责审核链接内容。
text: 5.2 审核5.2 Examination and Verification（1）本公司有权审核客户方数据推广内容。本公司有权根据相关法律法规和服务相关协议与规则制定审核规则。基于规则运行情况，安全、合规和保密性要求，本公司有权自行决定审核规则是否披露和具体披露方案。（1）The Company shall be entitled to examine and verify the Customer's Marketing Materials. The Company shall formulate the examination and verification rules in accordance with relevant laws, regulations and Services-related Agreements and Rules. Based on the operation of the rules, security, compliance and confidentiality requirements, the Company shall be entitled to determine whether to disclose the rules and the specific disclosure plan at its sole discretion.（2）本公司的审核范围与审核义务仅限于对客户方数据推广内容的合法性进行形式审核。如客户方数据推广内容包含链接，本公司仅从技术角度审核该链接是否可在手机、电脑等终端设备上成功展示和被打开，不负责审核链接指向的内容。（2）The scope of examination and verification by the Company shall be limited to the formality examination and verification on the legality of the Customer's Marketing Materials. If the Customer's Marketing Materials contain links, the Company shall only examine and verify whether the link can be successfully displayed and opened on mobile phones, computers and other terminal devices, and the Company shall not be responsible for examining and verifying the content directed to by the link.

page_name: 巨量千川数据推广服务协议
title: 5.3 责任声明​
page_url: 总知识库_cleaned/抖音电商规则中心/生态角色/巨量千川/巨量千川数据推广服务协议.html
summary: 本公司的审核不保证客户方数据推广内容的真实性和合法性，相关法律责任由客户自行承担。客户需足额赔偿因推广内容引发的争议、诉求、纠纷，不得以第三方审核或提供资质为理由拒绝承担责任。
text: 5.3 责任声明5.3 Statement on Responsibilities本公司的审核不代表本公司为客户方数据推广内容的真实性、合法性负责。任何因客户方数据推广内容，客户方所销售或推广的商品与服务交易、履约或售后等数据推广后链路行为引起的争议、诉求、纠纷应由客户自行承担全部法律责任，由此导致本公司和/或本公司关联公司受到任何损失的（包括但不限于任何第三方索赔、先行垫付的赔偿款或国家机关处罚等），客户应当足额赔偿。届时，客户不得以数据推广内容、相关资质经本公司审核或由其他第三方提供而拒绝按照本协议约定承担赔偿责任。The examination and verification of the Company does not mean that the Company is responsible for the authenticity and legality of the Customer's Marketing Materials .The Customer shall take full responsibility for any disputes, claims and disagreements arising from the Customer's Marketing Materials, the transaction, performance, after-sale services and other post-data-promotion activities related to the products or services sold or promoted by the Customer, and shall compensate the Company for any loss caused to the company and/or its affiliates (including but not limited to any third-party claims, compensation paid in advance, or punishment by state agencies, etc.). At that time, the customer shall not refuse to assume the liability for compensation in accordance with this agreement because the Customer's Marketing Materials and relevant qualifications have been reviewed by the Company or provided by other third parties.

page_name: 巨量千川数据推广服务协议
title: 5.4 审核结果​
page_url: 总知识库_cleaned/抖音电商规则中心/生态角色/巨量千川/巨量千川数据推广服务协议.html
summary: 这段内容主要阐述了关于审核结果的规定，无论客户方数据推广内容是否已经发布，只要公司发现或怀疑其违法违规、违反公序良俗或严重损害消费者体验，公司有权拒绝发布或要求修改，未修改完前拒绝发布。如客户拒不修改或逾期修改，公司有权解除协议或提前终止，并要求客户支付延迟发布期间的推广服务费。公司、抖店平台和/或精选联盟平台将根据平台规则审核包含商品购买链接的客户方数据推广内容，如审核结果为商品不可在客户方数据推广内容中展示或分享，客户将无权通过精选联盟平台获取佣金。
text: 5.4 审核结果5.4 Results of the Examination and Verification（1）无论客户方数据推广内容是否已经发布，或是否属于本公司审核责任范围，只要本公司发现或合理怀疑客户方数据推广内容违法违规，违反社会公序良俗，或严重损害消费者体验或流量媒体用户体验，本公司有权拒绝发布该数据推广内容，或要求客户根据本公司书面通知要求进行修改，未修改完成前拒绝发布该数据推广内容，对由此导致的数据推广发布延迟、中止或终止，本公司无需承担违约责任。如客户拒不修改数据推广内容或逾期修改数据推广内容影响本公司数据推广业务的正常开展，本公司有权单方解除或提前终止本协议，和要求客户支付延迟发布期间相应的推广服务费。Regardless of whether the Customer's Marketing Materials are released, or within the scope of the Company's responsibility of examination and verification, once the Company identifies or reasonably doubts that the Customer's Marketing Materials violate relevant laws and regulations, or public order and good morals, or seriously harm the experience of consumers or users of the Traffic Media,the Company shall have the right to reject Customer Marketing Materials, or request the Customer to make modifications as required by the Company's written notice before advertising Customer Marketing Materials. The Company is not liable for any delay, suspension or termination of the release of Customer Marketing Materials caused thereby. If the normal operation of the Company’s data promotion business is affected due to the reason that the Customer refuses to modify Customer Marketing Materials or changes Customer Marketing Materials in time, the Company has the right to unilaterally terminate the Agreement or terminate the Agreement in advance, and require the Customer to pay the corresponding the Promotion Service Fee for the period of delayed release.（2）本公司、抖店平台和/或精选联盟平台将根据抖店平台商品展示或精选联盟平台的商品分享功能相关规则审核包含商品购买链接的客户方数据推广内容，如审核结果为该商品不可被展示或分享在客户方数据推广内容中，客户将无权通过精选联盟平台获取佣金。（2）The Company, the Doudian Platform and/or the Premium Affiliate Platform will examine and verify the Customer's Marketing Materials containing links to purchase a product, based on rules related to product listing on the Doudian Platform or the product sharing function of the Premium Affiliate Platform. In the event that the results of examination and verification show that the product shall not be displayed or shared in the Customer's Marketing Materials, the Customer shall not be entitled to obtain commissions through the Premium Affiliate Platform.

page_name: 巨量千川数据推广服务协议
title: 5.5 审核规则调整​
page_url: 总知识库_cleaned/抖音电商规则中心/生态角色/巨量千川/巨量千川数据推广服务协议.html
summary: 本公司有权根据法律、法规、政策及经营策略调整广告审核规则等行业准入规范，通知客户并要求其修改或补充相关文件。如客户不满足调整后的规则，公司有权拒绝发布或暂停发布其营销内容，不承担责任。
text: 5.5 审核规则调整5.5 Adjustments to the Rules of Examination and Verification本公司有权根据有关法律、法规的变化，国家政策和市场环境的调整以及本公司经营策略和需要不时调整广告审核规则、行业准入规范、数据推广规则、特定行业保证金要求等，调整后的上述规则和要求本公司将会在巨量千川平台以公告形式统一通知、或电子邮件通知或以其他合理方式通知客户。如果客户使用数据推广服务的行为不满足本公司调整后规则和要求，客户应当立即按照调整后的标准进行修改或者补充相关文件并提交本公司审核，或立即停止数据推广服务并书面通知本公司终止本协议，如客户未立即停止使用本服务或者修改、补充后的文件仍不能满足的，对于客户不满足上述调整后的客户方数据推广内容，本公司有权拒绝发布或拒绝继续发布且不予以承担任何责任。The Company has the right to, in accordance with changes in relevant laws and regulations, the adjustment of national policies and market environment as well as the needs of the Company’s business strategy, adjust advertisement review rules, industry access standards, data promotion rules and specific industry security deposit requirements from time to time. The Company will notify the Customer of the above adjusted rules and requirements in the form of announcement, e-mail or other reasonable way specified on OESA Platform.If the Customer's usage of the Services no longer meets the adjusted rules and requirements of the Company, the Customer shall immediately modify the Data Promotion Services or supplement relevant documents in accordance with the adjusted standards and submit them to the Company for review, or immediately stop the Data Promotion Services and notify the Company in writing to terminate the Agreement. If the Customer does not immediately stop using the services or the modified or supplemented documents still cannot meet the requirements of the adjusted rules, the Company shall have the right to refuse or suspend the release of the Customer's Marketing Materials that cannot meet the requirements of the adjusted rules without any liability.

page_name: 巨量千川数据推广服务协议
title: 5.6 跨账户素材授权​
page_url: 总知识库_cleaned/抖音电商规则中心/生态角色/巨量千川/巨量千川数据推广服务协议.html
summary: 该文档解释了跨账户素材授权规则，即客户在其巨量千川账户和商品所属抖店商家名下的巨量千川账户有权使用商品营销素材推广同一商品。客户可以通过移除商品来终止跨账户素材授权。平台会在终止授权或删除客户方数据推广内容后，选择对投放系统和运营成本影响最小的方案处理已授权的客户方数据推广内容及相关服务数据。
text: 5.6 跨账户素材授权（1）客户知悉并同意，如客户方数据推广内容挂载特定商品（该等内容，以下简称“商品营销素材”），客户名下的巨量千川账户，和该商品所属抖店商家名下的巨量千川账户，在投放全域推广-推商品时，有权使用商品营销素材推广同一商品（该等授权，以下简称“跨账户素材授权”）。（1）The Customer acknowledges and agrees that, if the Customer's Marketing Materials attaches a certain product, the OESA Accounts under the name of the Customer, and the OESA Accounts under the name of the merchant of the Douyin store to which the product belongs, shall be entitled to use such Customer's Marketing Materials to promote the same product ("Cross-account Material Authorization") .（2）客户可通过移除客户方数据推广内容挂载的商品来终止跨账户素材授权。但是，授权终止或客户方数据推广内容被删除后，巨量千川平台有权选择对投放系统和运营成本影响最小的方案处理已授权的客户方数据推广内容及相关服务数据。（2）The Customer may terminate the Cross-account Material Authorization by removing the product attached to the Customer's Marketing Materials. However, after such termination of authorization or deletion of the Customer's Marketing Materials, the OESA Platform shall be entitled to select a solution that has the least impact on the advertising system and operating costs to handle the authorized Customer's Marketing Materials and relevant Service Data.

page_name: 巨量千川数据推广服务协议
title: 6.1 统计数据​
page_url: 总知识库_cleaned/抖音电商规则中心/生态角色/巨量千川/巨量千川数据推广服务协议.html
summary: 本协议项下的所有数据，包括服务数据和流量资源位信息等，由公司统计。公司生成的统计数据作为双方结算依据。客户可在公司同意范围内委托第三方机构监测和统计数据，但第三方数据不可作为结算依据。客户需确保第三方机构实施必要的措施与技术手段，以保障数据安全。
text: 6.1 统计数据6.1 Statistics（1）本协议项下的所有数据，包括服务数据、流量资源位信息等，均由本公司统计。本公司应当以客观、真实的方式生成统计数据。（1）All data under this Agreement, including but not limited to Service Data and the information of the RITs, shall be collected and calculated by the Company, and the Company shall generate statistical data in an objective and truthful manner.（2）本公司生成的统计数据应当作为双方结算依据。在遵循服务相关协议与规则、本公司公示或以其他方式告知的数据监测和统计规则的前提下，在本公司同意向客户开放监测的服务类型和流量资源位范围内，客户可委托第三方机构监测和统计数据，但第三方机构的数据统计结果不可作为结算依据。就第三方机构数据监测和统计数据过程中获知的信息，客户与第三方统计机构应当严格保密，不可用于本服务之外目的。客户应当自行实施，或确保第三方机构实施必要的、不低于行业水位的措施与技术手段，以保障数据安全。（2）The statistics generated by the Company shall serve as the basis for settlement by both parties. Under the premise that the Customer complies with the Service-related Agreements and Rules, and the rules for monitoring and collecting statistics announced or otherwise notified by the Company, within the available scope of the types of the Services and the RITs agreed by the Company, the Customer may entrust a third party to monitor and collect statistics; provided that the statistics generated by third-party agencies shall not serve as the basis for settlement. With respect to the information obtained during the process of statistics monitoring and collecting, the Customer and third-party statistical agencies shall keep strictly confidential, and shall not use the information for purposes other than the Services. Customers shall implement by themselves or ensure that third-party agencies implement necessary measures and technical means that are not lower than the industry level to ensure data security.

page_name: 巨量千川数据推广服务协议
title: 6.3 数据处理声明​
page_url: 总知识库_cleaned/抖音电商规则中心/生态角色/巨量千川/巨量千川数据推广服务协议.html
summary: 本文档6.3节强调，客户需同意公司提供数据推广服务的宗旨是为客户提供产品和服务的推广渠道，同时也保护受众的隐私。客户需承诺不使用反映受众真实身份的、数据主体个人困境相关的或带有偏见和歧视性的个人信息或标签类别，违反者需承担全部责任并赔偿公司及其关联公司及数据主体造成的侵害。这是为了保护个人权利，避免对交易相对人施加不合理的差别待遇。
text: 6.3 数据处理声明6.3 Statement on Data Processing客户理解并同意，本公司提供数据推广服务的宗旨之一，是为客户提供相关产品和服务的推广渠道，也为受众人群提供适当的产品和服务展示，本公司不支持任何对受众人群的具体真实身份进行不当挖掘和侵扰的行为。客户承诺不使用反映受众真实身份的、数据主体个人困境相关的或带有偏见和歧视性的个人信息或标签类别，以对个人权利产生侵害或对交易相对人施加不合理的差别待遇。若客户违反本条规定，应当负责赔偿相关行为对本公司、本公司关联公司及数据主体造成的侵害，并承担全部责任。The Customer understands and agrees, one of the purposes of the Services is to provide the Customer with a channel to promote relevant products and services, and to provide the audience with an appropriate display of relevant products and services. The Company does not support any improper mining of the specific real identities of the audience or intrusive behavior towards the audience.The Customer promises not to use personal information or label categories that reflect the real identity of the audience, relates to the personal plight of the data subject or are biased and discriminatory in order to infringe on individual rights or impose unreasonable differential treatment on counterparties of a transaction. If the Customer violates the provisions of this article, it shall be responsible for compensating for the damage caused to the Company, the Company's affiliated companies and data subjects, and assume full responsibility.

page_name: 巨量千川数据推广服务协议
title: 6.4 数据查询​
page_url: 总知识库_cleaned/抖音电商规则中心/生态角色/巨量千川/巨量千川数据推广服务协议.html
summary: 该文档6.4节规定了数据查询的时间周期、字段范围和展现方案以巨量千川平台实际提供的功能为准，受限于现有技术和条件所能达到的现状。客户如因运营需求或本服务相关争议申请查询数据，应在争议情形发生后7个自然日内提交数据查询申请书面文件。逾期查询可能不被支持，或可能耗费不合理的商业成本。如未能及时向平台提交数据查询申请，视作客户放弃数据查询权利。
text: 6.4 数据查询6.4 Data Query（1）受限于现有技术和条件所能达到的现状，客户可查询数据的时间周期、字段范围和展现方案，以巨量千川平台实际提供的功能为准。（1）Limited by the current situation that the existing technology and conditions can achieve, the time period, field range and display scheme of data available for the Customer to query shall be provided on an "as-is" basis.（2）如因运营需求或本服务相关争议，客户申请查询数据，应在争议情形发生后7个自然日内，按照巨量千川平台的要求，提交数据查询申请的书面文件。受限于数据存储期限，逾期查询可能不被支持，或可能耗费不合理的商业成本。如未能及时向平台提交数据查询申请，视作客户放弃数据查询权利。（2）In the event that the Customer applies to query data due to operational needs or disputes related to the Services, the Customer should submit a written document for the data query application in accordance with the requirements of the OESA Platform. Limited by the data storage peirod, overdue inquiry may not be supported, or will incur unreasonable commercial costs. In case of failing to submit a data inquiry application to the platform in time, the customer shall be deemed as waiving data query rights.

page_name: 巨量千川数据推广服务协议
title: 6.5 数据保存​
page_url: 总知识库_cleaned/抖音电商规则中心/生态角色/巨量千川/巨量千川数据推广服务协议.html
summary: 该文档6.5节规定，公司有权在其服务器和/或关联公司的服务器上保存服务数据，并决定数据保留期限，无义务永久保存。这是运营策略，体现了公司的数据保存规则。
text: 6.5 数据保存6.5 Data Preservation本公司有权在本公司和/或本公司关联公司的服务器上，在法律法规所允许的范围内保存服务数据。本公司有权根据运营情况、商业成本和现有技术所能达到的水平，自行决定服务数据保留期限。本公司无义务永久保存服务数据。The Company shall be entitled to preserve the Service Data on the servers of the Company and/or its affiliated companies within the scope permitted by laws and regulations. The Company shall be entitled to determine the preservation period of the Service Data in its sole discretion based on operating conditions, commercial costs and the level that existing technology can achieve. The Company is not obligated to permanently preserve the Service Data.

page_name: 巨量千川数据推广服务协议
title: 7.1 服务​
page_url: 总知识库_cleaned/抖音电商规则中心/生态角色/巨量千川/巨量千川数据推广服务协议.html
summary: 7.1 服务7.1 Services本公司会根据客户选择的服务以及计费方式等情况向客户提供相应服务。The Company will provide corresponding services to the Customer according to the services and billing methods selected by the Customer.
text: 7.1 服务7.1 Services本公司会根据客户选择的服务以及计费方式等情况向客户提供相应服务。The Company will provide corresponding services to the Customer according to the services and billing methods selected by the Customer.

page_name: 巨量千川数据推广服务协议
title: 7.2 治理措施​
page_url: 总知识库_cleaned/抖音电商规则中心/生态角色/巨量千川/巨量千川数据推广服务协议.html
summary: 该文档介绍了平台对违规行为的治理措施，包括暂停或终止数据推广服务，对客户巨量千川账户采取限制措施，向客户退回未消耗且不涉及其他争议的预付推广服务费，清空赠款、消返红包、优惠券等巨量千川优惠权益，要求客户提供材料以证明客户行为的合法性等。这些措施无需承担任何法律责任和费用补偿。除上述治理措施之外，公司还有权要求客户进一步承担法律责任，或采取其他适合的处理措施。
text: 7.2 治理措施7.2 Governing Measures如平台基于第三方举报/投诉、有权部门通知、风控系统监测或其他线索识别到或合理怀疑客户使用本服务过程中的行为违反法律法规或服务相关协议与规则，包括非官方渠道充值或其他充值行为异常，数据推广内容本身或所指向的内容违法违规或违反服务相关协议与规则，不当使用本公司向客户开放的数据或相关接口或未经授权的数据或接口，未及时足额缴纳推广服务费，注册/注销/计划创建/设置/数据查询等操作或请求的频率过高等，本公司有权根据具体情形采取以下一项或多项治理措施，且不必因执行治理措施而承担任何法律责任和费用补偿。In the event that, according to reports from the victims, notifications from a competent authority, monitoring by the risk control system or other clues, the Company identifies or reasonably suspects that the Customer's conduct during the process of the Services violates laws and regulations, or Services-related Agreements and Rules, including but not limited to: (a) unofficial channel recharge or other abnormal recharge behavior; (b) the Customer's Marketing Materials or the contents directed to thereof violate the laws and regulations or the Service Related Agreements and Rules；(c) improper use of data or relevant interfaces opened to the Customer by the Company, or unauthorized data or interfaces; (d) failure to pay Promotion Service Fees in full and on time; (e) excessively high frequency of registration/cancellation/plan creation /Settings/Data query and other operations or requests, etc., the Company shall have the right to take one or more of the following governing measures according to the specific circumstances, without bearing any legal liability and cost compensation for imposing such governing measures.（1）暂停或终止数据推广服务，包括但不限于停止数据推广，断开接口，拒绝客户操作请求，限制特定模块访问或使用权限；（1）Suspend or terminate the Services, including but not limited to suspend the data promotion, cut off the interface, reject the Customer's operation request, and restrict the access or usage permission to specific modules;（2）对客户的巨量千川账户采取限制措施；（2）Impose Restrictive Measures on the Customer's OESA Account；（3）向客户退回未消耗且不涉及其他争议的预付推广服务费；（3）Return the Promotion Services Fee prepaid by the Customer which is not consumed, provided that the amount is not in dispute;（4）清空赠款、消返红包、优惠券等巨量千川优惠权益；（4）Disable all OESA Coupons, including but not limited to gift benefits, "Xiaofan" Red Envelopes and OESA Mobile Coupons;（5）要求客户提供材料以证明客户行为的合法性；（5）Require the Customer to provide materials to prove the legality of the Customer’s behavior；除上述治理措施之外，本公司亦有权要求客户进一步承担法律责任，或采取其他本公司认为适合的处理措施。In addition to the above measures, the Company shall be entitled to require the Customer to take further legal responsibilities, or take other measures that the Company deems appropriate.

page_name: 巨量千川数据推广服务协议
title: 7.3 审核权​
page_url: 总知识库_cleaned/抖音电商规则中心/生态角色/巨量千川/巨量千川数据推广服务协议.html
summary: 本公司拥有审核权，可审查客户数据推广内容、商品与服务及发布的信息。如发现问题，有权要求改正，删除信息，并对客户名下账户执行限制措施或治理措施。如因此造成损失，可向客户索赔。
text: 7.3 审核权7.3 Right of Examination and Verification本公司有权审核客户方数据推广内容、客户销售或推广的商品与服务以及发布的信息，如本公司识别到或合理怀疑客户方数据推广内容、客户销售或推广的商品与服务或发布的信息存在问题，有权根据服务相关协议与规则，向客户发出询问、要求改正的通知，删除信息，对客户或客户关联方名下账户执行限制措施或治理措施，并就因此造成的损失向客户索赔。The Company shall be entitled to examine and verify Customer Marketing Materials, the Customer's products sold or promoted, and information published. In the event that the Company identifies or suspects any defects with Customer Marketing Materials, the Customer's products and services sold or promoted, and information published, the Company shall be entitled to issue a notice to the Customer for inquiries and requests for corrections, delete relevant information, impose Restrictive Measures on the OESA Accounts of the Customer and the Customer's Affiliates according to the Service-related Agreements and Rules, and claim compensation from the Customer for any and all losses resulted from such defects.

page_name: 巨量千川数据推广服务协议
title: 7.4 知识产权​
page_url: 总知识库_cleaned/抖音电商规则中心/生态角色/巨量千川/巨量千川数据推广服务协议.html
summary: 本文档7.4节强调，本公司的关联公司对平台、接口、软件相关内容及名称拥有所有权和知识产权，且未经书面同意，这些权利不会发生任何形式转移。这体现了公司对知识产权的重视和保护，以及其运营策略中对知识产权的严格管理。
text: 7.4 知识产权7.4 Intellectual Property Rights本公司或本公司关联公司依法对平台、接口、软件相关内容及名称享有所有权和知识产权，未经本公司或本公司关联公司书面同意，该等权利在任何情况下均不发生任何形式的转移。The Company or its affiliated companies shall have the ownership and intellectual property rights over the platform, interface, software and related contents and names according to the law, and such rights shall not be transferred in any form under any circumstances without the written consent by the Company and its affiliated companies.

page_name: 巨量千川数据推广服务协议
title: 7.5 客户方许可内容​
page_url: 总知识库_cleaned/抖音电商规则中心/生态角色/巨量千川/巨量千川数据推广服务协议.html
summary: 该文档主要规定了客户方许可内容的使用权、传播权等，以及公司基于公安、检察院、法院等监管部门要求收集、记录、保存、披露、转移或以其他方式处理许可内容的权利。许可内容自客户线上同意本协议之日起生效，协议终止后，未经客户书面终止，该许可仍有效。
text: 7.5 客户方许可内容7.5 Licensed Content by the Customer（1）就客户方数据推广内容、服务数据和其他客户方与本公司就许可事宜达成约定的内容（“许可内容”），客户给予本公司一项全球的、免费的、非独家的、可再许可的权利（包括但不限于复制权、信息网络传播权、改编权、汇编权、修改权、翻译权、制作衍生品权、表演权和展示权等）许可，基于该项许可，本公司有权使用许可内容介绍、说明或解读服务相关协议与规则，宣传推广本公司及关联方平台或品牌，丰富数据推广案例库，推荐客户方数推广内容，参与评奖，分析、优化或以其他方式处理许可内容。上述许可包括使用、复制、展示、传播您拥有或被许可使用并植入内容中的个人形象、肖像、姓名、商标、服务标志、品牌、名称、标识、公司标记及其他素材等。（1）Regarding the Customer's Marketing Materials, the Service Data and other content agreed between the Customer and the Company on licensing matters ("Licensed Content"), the Customer grants the Company a worldwide, free, non-exclusive, sublicensable right (including but not limited to reproduction rights, information network Dissemination rights, adaptation rights, compilation rights, modification rights, translation rights, derivative production rights, performance rights and display rights, etc.), under which, the Company shall be entitled to use the Licensed Content to introduce, demonstrate or interpret the Service-related Agreements and Rules, publize and promote the platforms and brands operated by the Company and its affiliates, enrich the data promotion case library, recommend the Customer's Marketing Materials, participate in awards, analyze, optimize or process the Licensed Content in other ways. Such a license includes the use, reproduction, display, and dissemination of your personal image, portrait, name, trademark, service mark, brand, name, logo, company mark, and other materials that you own or are licensed to use and embed into the Licensed Content.（2）本公司有权基于公安、检察院、法院或其他监管部门要求，应对第三方投诉等合理情形收集、记录、保存、披露、转移或以其他方式处理许可内容。（2）The Company shall be entitled to collect, record, preserve, disclose, transfer or otherwise process the Licensed Content in response to third-party complaints and other reasonable circumstances based on the requirements of the public security department, procuratorate department, the court or other regulatory authorities.（3）基于该条的许可自客户线上同意本协议之日起生效，协议生效期间不可撤销。协议终止后，未经客户书面终止，该许可仍有效。（3）The license granted in this section shall take effect from the date the Customer agrees to this Agreement online and remains irrevocable during the validity period of this Agreement. After the Agreement is terminated, the license shall remain in effect without written termination by the customer.

page_name: 巨量千川数据推广服务协议
title: 7.6 费用相关​
page_url: 总知识库_cleaned/抖音电商规则中心/生态角色/巨量千川/巨量千川数据推广服务协议.html
summary: 本文主要阐述费用相关内容，包括客户授权公司从其预付款和客户与公司关联公司产生的款项中扣除相关费用，如欠付的数据推广费用等。客户在巨量千川平台进行数据推广活动时，如有对第三方的给付义务，可授权公司从相关款项中扣除并支付至第三方。客户在巨量广告平台和/或巨量本地推平台注册账户后，可申请开通资金共享功能。开通后，客户可根据规则对资金账户与投放账户进行设置，并使用投放钱包余额为其绑定的投放账户支付推广服务费。除非另有约定，公司无需为享有本协议权益向客户支付任何费用。
text: 7.6 费用相关7.6 费用相关7.6 Fee-related（1）客户授权本公司从客户的预付款、客户与本公司或本公司关联公司依照其他约定产生的款项（“客户方款项”）中扣除客户应当向本公司、本公司关联方支付、返还或赔偿的金额，包括但不限于欠付的数据推广费用、违约金、赔偿金、保证金、返货金额和配送金额等。The Customer authorizes the Company to deduct the amount that the Customer is obligated to pay, return or compensate to the Company or its affiliates from the Customer's pre-payments or other receivables generated from Agreements between the Customer and the Company and/or the Company's affiliates (collectively， the "Customer's Receivables"), including but not limited to unpaid Promotion Fees, liquidated damages, compensation, deposits, rebate amounts and proportional gift amounts.（2）如客户在巨量千川平台进行数据推广活动的过程中，产生对第三方的给付义务（包括但不限于使用了第三方服务产品，基于不当得利返还或法律法规相关规定而应当向第三方支付的费用），客户授权本公司从相关款项中直接扣除相应款项，用于代客户支付至第三方。In the event of any obligations to pay a third party that are generated by the Customer during the data promotion activities on the OESA Platform, including but not limited to, fees that the Customer shall pay to a third-party due to the use of third-party services or products, improper gains, and requirements by relevant laws and regulations, the Customer authorizes the Company to directly deduct from the Customer's Receivables and pay the third party on behalf of the Customer.（3）如客户已在巨量广告平台和/或巨量本地推平台注册账户，开通数据推广服务并签署相应合作协议，客户可基于巨量千川平台相关指引，申请开通资金共享功能。资金共享功能的开通和使用以客户以线下或线上形式确认的协议、规则和平台页面的通知或公示为准。客户可根据资金共享功能的规则，对资金账户与投放账户进行设置。当客户将用于投放的资金账户（“投放钱包”）与投放账户绑定（包括巨量广告账户、巨量本地推账户和巨量千川账户，以客户实际绑定的投放账户为准）时，表明同意使用投放钱包余额为其绑定的投放账户支付推广服务费。（3）If the customer has registered an account and executed the corresponding cooperation agreement with Ocean Engine Advertising Platform or Ocean Engine Local Ads Platform and activated the corresponding data promotion services, the Customer may apply to activate the "Big Wallet" function. The activation and use of the "Big Wallet" function shall be subject to the rules and agreements confirmed by the Customer and the platform notices and announcements. The Customer may set and manage the fund account and the data promotion accounts. In the event that the Customer binds the fund account for data promotion (the "Wallet for Promotion") with a dama promotion account (including the Ocean Engine Advertising Account, the Ocean Engine Local Ads Account and the OESA Account， subject to the account actually bound by the Customer, hereinafter "Account for Promotion"), the Customer agrees to pay the Promotion Service Fee incurred in the Accounts for Promotion by the Wallet for Promotion。（4）除非另有约定，本公司无需为按照本协议享有的权益而向客户支付任何费用。（4）Unless otherwise agreed, the Company does not need to pay any fee to the Customer for its rights and interests hereunder.

page_name: 巨量千川数据推广服务协议
title: 7.7 第三方争议解决​
page_url: 总知识库_cleaned/抖音电商规则中心/生态角色/巨量千川/巨量千川数据推广服务协议.html
summary: 这是一份关于第三方争议解决的规则，主要规定了平台在遇到投诉时可以采取的措施，包括执行治理措施、要求提供文件、调查客户、解除或终止协议、要求赔偿等。巨量千川平台有权在怀疑客户商品或服务质量低劣、客户方数据推广内容侵犯第三方合法权益或客户方不合理使用服务导致投诉方损失时采取这些措施。
text: 7.7 第三方争议解决7.7 Third-party Disputes Resolution如巨量千川平台或流量媒体方基于消费者或其他第三方（“投诉方”）投诉，有权部门通知、风控系统监测、新闻报道或其他线索识别或合理怀疑客户推广的商品与服务质量低劣、客户方数据推广内容侵犯第三方合法权益、客户方不合理使用本服务导致投诉方损失，巨量千川平台有权：In the event that the OESA Platform or the Traffic Media Providers identifies or reasonably suspects that the products or services promoted by the Customer are of poor quality, the Customer's Marketing Materials infringes upon the legitimate rights and interests of a third party, or the Customer's abuse of the Services results in losses to the Complaining Party, according to complaints from a consumer or a third-party (the "Complaining Party"), notifications from a competent authority, monitoring by risk control system, news reports or other clues, the OESA Platform shall be entitled to：（1）执行如第7.2条所述的治理措施。（1）Implement the Governing Measures as described in Section 7.2.（2）应要求，向有权部门提供文件，数据或信息。（2）Provide documents, data or information to the competent authority as required.（3）对客户启动调查，要求客户提供陈述、证明或其他支持文件（“支持文件”）；收到支持文件后，巨量千川平台有权将支持文件提供至投诉方或有权部门。如客户未能提供支持文件或支持文件不足以支持其抗辩，巨量千川平台有权要求客户纠正不当行为。（3）Initiate an investigation against the Customer and request the Customer to provide statements, proofs or other supporting documents ("Supporting Documents"). Upon receiving the Supporting Documents, the OESA Platform shall be entitled to provide the Supporting Documents to the Complaining Party or competent authorities. If the Customer fails to provide Supporting Documents or Supporting Documents are insufficient to defend against the Complaining Party's claims, the Company shall be entitled to require the Customer to correct inappropriate behaviors.（4）解除或终止协议，并要求客户支付相当于被投诉商品或服务相应的推广服务费或者伍仟元（以较高者为准）的违约金；若客户行为导致本公司或流量媒体方向任何第三方赔偿或者遭受有权部门处罚的，客户还应当足额赔偿本公司以及流量媒体方因此遭受的全部损失。（4）Cancel or terminate the Agreement, and requires the Customer to pay liquidated damages equivalent to the Promotion Service Fee for the products or services complained of or ￥5,000 (whichever is higher); if the Customer's behavior causes the Company or the Traffic Media Providers to compensate any third party or suffer any penalty imposed by competent authorities, the Customer shall also fully compensate the Company and the Traffic Media Providers for all losses suffered as a result.（5）如第三方基于客户方数据推广内容而购买商品或服务，与客户产生任何纠纷或争议，客户应当自行承担责任，并确保本公司免责；如本公司基于消费者投诉或有权机关的要求，就客户推广商品或服务，对消费者先行赔付的，客户应当足额赔偿本公司的全部损失。（5）The Customer shall be responsible for any and all disputes or controversies between the Customer and any third party arising from the third party’s purchase of products or services lead by the Customer's Marketing Materials, and ensure that the Company is exempt from liability. If the Company compensates the consumers in advance for the products or services promoted by the Customer, according to the consumer’s complaints or the request of a competent authority the Customer shall fully compensate the Company for all the losses.（6）暂停履行本协议，并自行决定是否恢复履行；本公司如决定恢复履行，不免除客户承担本协议项下违约责任。（6）Suspend the performance of this Agreement, and determine whether to resume the performance on its sole discretion；the resumption of performance by the Company does not exempt the Customer from liability for breach of contract under this Agreement.

page_name: 巨量千川数据推广服务协议
title: 8.1 账户安全​
page_url: 总知识库_cleaned/抖音电商规则中心/生态角色/巨量千川/巨量千川数据推广服务协议.html
summary: 这是一份关于账户安全的规定，强调客户需妥善保管登录账号和密码，不得将登录信息或账户资源分享给第三方。巨量千川平台根据客户登录信息判断客户身份，客户需自行承担不安全操作的法律后果。如发现非法使用或安全漏洞，应立即通知巨量千川平台。客户违反规定，平台有权采取限制措施或终止部分服务，并收取不安全操作产生的服务费，无义务退还。为确保账户安全，平台有权要求客户在登录一段时间后完成登录身份验证。
text: 8.1 账户安全8.1 Security of the Account（1）客户应妥善保管自己的登录账号和密码（“登录信息”）并确保账户安全性，不应将登录信息或巨量千川账户内相关资源分享、转卖、出租或出借给第三方。（1）The Customer shall properly keep their login account and password ("Login Information") and ensure the security of the account, and should not share, resell, rent or lend the login information or related resources in the account to third parties.（2）巨量千川平台仅根据客户的登录信息判断客户身份，并推定任何使用登录信息登录、访问和操作巨量千川账户的人是客户本人或已获得客户授权。（2）The OESA Platform judges the identity of the Customer only based on the customer's login information, and presumes that anyone who uses the login information to log in, access and operate the OESA Account is the Customer or has been authorized by the Customer.（3）如发生包括但不限于登录信息泄露、被盗用、客户自行登录账户后将操作页面置于不安全环境等情形，导致任何非客户本人进行的账户使用或误操作（“不安全操作”），客户应自行承担相应的法律后果。客户如获悉任何非法使用巨量千川账户或存在安全漏洞的情况，应立即通知本公司，客户应自行承担未及时通知而造成的损失。（3）In case of situations including but not limited to leakage of login information, theft, or placing the operation page in an unsafe environment after the Customer logs into the account, resulting in any use or misoperation of the OESA account not performed by the Customer ("Unsecured Operations"), the Customer shall bear the corresponding legal consequences. If the Customer knows of any illegal use of the OESA Account or the existence of security loopholes, the Customer shall immediately notify the Company, and the Customer should bear the losses caused by the failure to make a timely notification.（4）如客户违反本条约定，巨量千川平台有权对客户的巨量千川账户采取限制措施或终止部分或全部数据推广服务。客户进一步认可并同意，不安全操作如包含数据推广行为且巨量千川平台已依据推广计划或推广订单设置和相应数据推广规则提供数据推广服务，巨量千川平台有权收取基于不安全操作而产生的推广服务费，无义务退还。（4）If the Customer violates this section, the OESA Platform has the right to take Restrictive Measures on the Customer's OESA Account or terminate part or all of the Services. The Customer further acknowledges and agrees, in the event that Unsecured Operations contain data promotion activities and the OESA platform has provided the Services according to the promotion plan or promotion order settings and the corresponding data promotion rules, the OESA Platform shall be entitled to the Promotion Service Fee generated by Unsecured Operations and has no obligation to make a refund.（5）为了保障账户的安全性和客户的合法权益，巨量千川平台有权要求客户在登录一段期间内不活跃的巨量千川账户之前，完成登录身份验证。（5）To protect the security of the OESA Account and the legitimate rights and interests of the Customer, the OESA Platform shall be entitled to require the Customer to complete login identity verification before logging into an OESA Account that has been inactive for a period of time.

page_name: 巨量千川数据推广服务协议
title: 8.2 信息提供与核验​
page_url: 总知识库_cleaned/抖音电商规则中心/生态角色/巨量千川/巨量千川数据推广服务协议.html
summary: 该文档主要规定了客户在提供财务信息和资质文件方面的真实性和合法性要求，以及公司对此的权益保障。客户需保证财务信息真实且与签约主体一致，否则需承担风险和赔偿责任。客户需按照公司要求提交资质文件并完成真实性验证。公司有权拒绝开通账户或终止服务，客户需承担法律责任和赔偿责任。若客户提交资质文件侵犯第三方权益，则客户需承担法律责任和赔偿责任。公司有权要求客户提供相关证据以证明数据推广内容的合法性和权利来源。
text: 8.2 信息提供与核验8.3 Submission and Verification of Information（1）客户应当保证其账户等财务信息的真实性并与本合同签约主体保持一致，如因客户提供的财务信息虚假或者不一致，导致的风险由客户承担，本公司不承担任何责任，由此给本公司造成损失的，客户应当予以赔偿。（1）The Customer shall guarantee the authenticity of its account and other financial information and keep it consistent with the subject of the Agreement.If the financial information provided by the Customer is false or inconsistent, the Customer shall bear the risk arising therefrom. The Company shall not bear any liability, and the Customer shall compensate the Company for any losses incurred thereby.（2）客户承诺按照本公司要求提交资质文件并完成相关真实性验证，否则本公司有权拒绝客户账户开通申请和/或中止、终止本服务且无须承担违约责任。如客户提交资质原因侵犯第三方合法权益的，由客户承担法律责任，如因此给本公司造成损失的，由客户承担赔偿责任。（2）The Customer warrants that the Customer shall submit qualification documents and complete the authenticity verification process as required by the Company, otherwise the Company has the right to reject the Customer’s application to register an account and/or suspend or terminate the Services without any liability for breach of contract. If the qualifications submitted by the Customer infringe upon the legitimate rights and interests of a third party, the Customer shall bear the legal liability; the Customer shall bear the liability for compensation if the Company suffers any loss therefrom.（3）若本公司以及流量媒体方对数据推广内容的合法性或权利来源存在任何疑问，客户应当按照本公司以及流量媒体方的要求提供相关证据以充分证明数据推广内容的合法性和权利来。（3）If the Company and the Traffic Media Provider have any doubt about the legality or the source of rights of the data promotion contents, the Customer shall, upon the request of the Company and the Traffic Media Provider, provide relevant evidence to fully prove the legality and the source of rights of the data promotion contents.

page_name: 巨量千川数据推广服务协议
title: 8.3宣传​
page_url: 总知识库_cleaned/抖音电商规则中心/生态角色/巨量千川/巨量千川数据推广服务协议.html
summary: 文档8.3规定，未经公司书面许可，客户及其关联方不得在市场数据推广、名片、文件、网站、对外宣传及其他方面使用公司及关联公司的名称、商标、商号、品牌、域名和网站或披露与公司合作事宜。公司有权暂停或终止协议，要求客户采取 remedial measures（包括停止使用和线下处理），公开客户违约行为，并要求客户赔偿因违约造成的公司及其关联公司的损失。这是公司保护自身知识产权和商业秘密的规定。
text: 8.3宣传8.3 Marketing未经本公司书面许可，客户及客户关联方不得在市场数据推广、名片、文件、网站、对外宣传以及其他任何方面使用本公司和本公司关联公司、流量媒体的名称、商标、商号、品牌、域名和网站或披露与本公司合作事宜。Without the written consent of the Company, the Customer and its affiliates shall not use the name, trademark, trade name, brand, domain name and website of the Company, the Company’s affiliates and the Traffic Media or disclose the cooperation with the Company in marketing data promotion, business cards, documents, websites, external publicity documents and any other aspects. The company has the right to suspend or terminate the Agreement and request the Customer to take remedial measures (including but not limited to stopping use and offline processing), publicize the customer's breach of contract, and require the customer to compensate the company and its affiliates for any damages caused by it.

page_name: 巨量千川数据推广服务协议
title: 8.4 电子签约​
page_url: 总知识库_cleaned/抖音电商规则中心/生态角色/巨量千川/巨量千川数据推广服务协议.html
summary: 该文档规定，使用电子签约方式签署合同的客户需保证提交的信息、文件真实有效，并授权公司根据电子签约平台要求将其传输审核。如因客户提交的信息、文件虚假无效导致审核无法通过，电子签约相关责任由客户承担。
text: 8.4 电子签约8.4 E-sign客户如使用电子签约方式与本公司签署合同/协议，保证通过本公司平台提交的申请签章的相关信息、文件真实有效并授权本公司根据第三方电子签约平台的要求将客户提交的信息、文件传输给第三方电子签约平台进行审核，审核通过后申请电子签章进行签约，如因客户提交的相关信息、文件虚假无效等导致审核无法通过并无法进行电子签约的相关责任由客户承担。If the Customer signs a contract/agreement with the Company by electronic signing, the Customer guarantees the authenticity and validity of the information and documents relating to the application for signature and seal submitted through the platform of the Company, and authorizes the Company to submit the information and documents presented by the Customer to the third-party electronic signing platform for review according to the signing platform’s requirements. If the information and documents are approved upon review, the Customer can apply for electronic signature and seal to sign a contract/agreement.If the information and documents are not approved upon review due to the reason that relevant information and documents submitted by the Customer are false or invalid, the Customer shall take full responsibility.

page_name: 巨量千川数据推广服务协议
title: 8.5 充值功能​
page_url: 总知识库_cleaned/抖音电商规则中心/生态角色/巨量千川/巨量千川数据推广服务协议.html
summary: 该文档规定，客户需按协议使用充值功能，否则将构成本协议项下的违约情形。如公司识别或合理怀疑客户违约充值，有权采取相应措施，处置客户巨量千川账户中的款项，拒绝收取和/或按照原支付方式退回涉嫌违约充值的款项。客户应积极配合调查，并承担补足差额的责任。
text: 8.5 充值功能8.5 Recharge Function（1）客户应根据本协议约定的范围和方式使用推广服务费预付功能（“充值功能”）。任何向非官方渠道支付，利用充值功能从事非法活动或规避服务相关协议与规则适用，或其他超出本协议约定范围和方式而使用充值功能的情形（“违约充值”），都将构成本协议项下的违约情形。（1）The Customer shall use the Promotion Service Fee pre-paid function ("Recharge Function") in accordance with the scope and methods agreed in this Agreement. Any payments to unofficial channels, usage of the Recharge Function to engage in illegal activities or circumvent the application of Service-related Agreements and Rules, or other situations in which the Recharge Function is used beyond the scope and methods agreed in this agreement (the "Recharge Function Abuse") will constitute a breach of contract under this Agreement.（2）如基于受害人举报、有权部门通知、风控系统监测或其他线索，本公司识别或合理怀疑客户违约充值，则有权基于收集到的线索，相关法律法规的规定和服务相关协议与规则，对客户采取第7.7条-第三方争议解决所述措施，处置客户巨量千川账户中的款项（返还受害人、赔偿给第三方或平台造成的损失等），拒绝收取和/或按照原支付方式退回涉嫌违约充值的款项。客户应积极配合巨量千川平台和有权机关的调查，如客户巨量千川账户中的款项不足以返还受害人或赔偿给第三方或平台造成的损失，客户应承担补足差额的责任。（2）If the Company identifies or reasonably suspects that a Recharge Function Abuse by the Customer, according to reports from the victims, notifications from a competent authority, monitoring by the risk control system or other clues, based on the clues collected, laws and regulations and Service-related Agreements and Rules, the Company shall be entitled to conduct measures described in Section 7.7 - Third-party disputes resolution, dispose the money in the Customer's OESA Account (return to the victims, and compensate the third party or the OESA Platform), reject and/or refund the money involving Recharge Function Abuse in the form of payment originally received. The Customer shall actively cooperate with the OESA Platform and competent authorities in the investigations, and shall bear the responsibility of making up the difference in the event that the amount of money in the Customer's OESA Account is insufficient to return to the victims or compensate for the losses caused to the third party or the OESA Platform.

page_name: 巨量千川数据推广服务协议
title: 8.6 委托数据推广行为​
page_url: 总知识库_cleaned/抖音电商规则中心/生态角色/巨量千川/巨量千川数据推广服务协议.html
summary: 该文档规定，客户委托营销服务商注册“虚客账户”并使用相关服务时，营销服务商有权访问和操作虚客账户，并决定其运营策略和投放设置，客户需承担相应责任。营销服务商有权访问客户名下“巨量千川账户”的整体投放效果数据，以优化投放。如因账户注册、注销、操作、计划设置、推广服务费或其他费用结算、数据推广策略等出现争议，客户需自行解决。
text: 8.6 委托数据推广行为8.6 Authorized Data Promotion Activities若客户委托营销服务商协助注册和运营巨量千川账户（“虚客账户”），并使用本服务，客户理解并同意：In the event that the Customer entrusts a Marketing Service Provider to register an OESA Account ("Visual Account") and use the Services, the Customer understands and agrees that:（1）营销服务商有权通过巨量引擎方舟平台提供的服务，访问和操作虚客账户。客户应与营销服务商确认本服务使用相关事宜，及时、充分知悉账户状态和使用情况。不论客户自行操作还是委托营销服务商操作，客户应为虚客账户下的行为承担相应责任。(1)The Marketing Service Provider is authorized to manage and operate the Visual Account through Ocean Engine Agent Platform. The Customer shall confirm matters related to the use of this Service with the Marketing Service Provider, and be fully informed of the status and usage of the Visual Account in a timely manner. Regardless of whether the Customer operates on his own or entrusts a Marketing Service Provider to operate, the Customer shall bear corresponding responsibility for the actions under the Virtual Account.（2）在客户委托范围内，营销服务商使用本服务和决定虚客账户的运营策略、投放设置等，有权基于优化投放的目的，访问客户名下巨量千川账户的整体投放效果数据（具体展示的数据字段，以虚客账户实际展示为准）。如因巨量千川账户注册、注销、操作、计划设置、推广服务费或其他费用结算、数据推广策略等出现任何争议，客户应当依据与营销服务商之间签署的协议约定自行解决。(2)Subject to the Customer's entrust, the Marketing Service Provider uses the Services and determines the operation strategy, advertising placement settings, etc. of the Virtual Account, and shall be entitled to access the overall advertising effect data (the specific data fields displayed in the Visual Account shall be served on an as-is basis ) of the Customer's OESA Accounts for the purpose of optimizing advertising placement. If any disputes arise due to the registration, cancellation, operation, plan setting, Promotion Fees or other fee settlements, data promotion strategies, etc. of the OESA Account, the Customer shall resolve it with the Marketing Service Provider according to their agreement.

page_name: 巨量千川数据推广服务协议
title: 8.7 人工智能生成内容​
page_url: 总知识库_cleaned/抖音电商规则中心/生态角色/巨量千川/巨量千川数据推广服务协议.html
summary: 该文档规定，若用户上传或发布基于深度学习、虚拟现实等生成式人工智能技术制作的非真实图像、音频、视频等可能导致消费者或公众混淆或误认的内容，需显著标识。如未按相关法律法规要求展示显著标识，公司有权采取相应措施，如通知整改、限制展示、暂停或终止服务。
text: 8.7 人工智能生成内容8.7 Artificial Intelligence Generated Content如客户在使用本服务过程中上传和发布利用基于深度学习、虚拟现实等生成式人工智能技术制作的非真实图像、音频、视频，或其他可能导致消费者或公众混淆或误认的内容时，客户应当以显著方式予以标识。本公司、关联平台或流量媒体方有权基于法律法规要求和服务相关协议与规则，定期或不定期、全面或抽样审核客户方数据推广内容，如识别到客户方数据推广内容未按相关法律法规要求展示显著标识，本公司有权根据法律法规和服务相关协议与规则、有权部门要求以及行业惯例采取相应措施，包括但不限于：（1）通知客户整改；（2）限制展示客户方数据推广内容；（3）暂停或终止部分或全部本服务。If the Customer uploads or publishes non-real images, audios, videos, or other contents that are generated by deep-learning, virtual reality, generative artificial intelligence technologies and may cause confusion or misunderstanding by consumers or the public, the Customer shall mark such content prominently. The Company, the Affiliating Platforms and the Traffic Media Providers shall be entitled to, regularly or irregularly, comprehensively or randomly, examine and verify the Customer's Marketing Materials according to laws, regulations, and the Service-related Agreements and Rules; if the Company identifies that the Customer's Marketing Materials are not marked prominently as required by applicable laws and regulations, the Company shall be entitled to take corresponding measures in accordance with laws, regulations, and Service-related Agreements and Rules, requirements by competent authorities and industry practices, including but not limited to: (1) Notifying customers to make rectifications; (2) Restricting the display of the Customer's Marketing Materials; (3) Suspension or terminate part or all of the Services.

page_name: 巨量千川数据推广服务协议
title: 9.1 资质和权限​
page_url: 总知识库_cleaned/抖音电商规则中心/生态角色/巨量千川/巨量千川数据推广服务协议.html
summary: 本协议要求双方均需具备合法资质和权限进行数据推广和签署合同。客户需以自身名义签署协议并承担合同责任。
text: 9.1 资质和权限9.1 Qualifications and Authorities（1）本公司保证其拥有从事数据推广的合法资质和签署本协议的权限。（1）The Company warrants that it has the legal qualifications to engage in data promotion and the authority to sign the Agreement.（2）客户保证其拥有推广客户产品或服务和签署本协议的合法权限。无论客户数据推广的标的物权利归属如何，客户均应以自己的名义签署本协议并直接承担合同责任。（2）The Customer warrants that it has the legal authority to promote products or services of the Customer and to enter into the Agreement. Regardless of ownership of the subject promoted by the Customer, the Customer shall enter into the Agreement in its own name and directly assume contractual liability.

page_name: 巨量千川数据推广服务协议
title: 9.2 参考内容​
page_url: 总知识库_cleaned/抖音电商规则中心/生态角色/巨量千川/巨量千川数据推广服务协议.html
summary: 该文档说明巨量千川平台向客户提供参考内容，包括推广内容设计、文案创作、投放策略、选品等方面的内容、参考案例等。客户需自行承担相应法律后果，确保使用参考内容的行为合法合规。参考内容仅作参考，平台不保证其许可、授权、承诺和保证。
text: 9.2 参考内容9.2 Reference Content巨量千川平台可能向客户提供或展示关于推广内容设计、文案创作、投放策略、选品等方面的内容、参考案例等或通过产品功能聚合优质创意素材（以下合称“参考内容”）。该参考内容的全部知识产权属于平台或其原权利人所有，客户不会以任何侵犯平台权益或第三方权益的方式使用。参考内容仅供客户参考，不应被视作本公司对全部或部分参考内容做出任何许可、授权、承诺和保证，客户应根据自身情况决定是否借鉴参考内容。客户应确保使用参考内容的行为合法合规，并自行承担相应法律后果。The OESA Platform may provide or display certain contents or reference cases on maketing materials design, copywriting creation, ads placement strategy, product selection, etc. to customers, or aggregate high-quality creative materials by online functions (hereinafter collectively referred to as "Reference Content"). Any and all intellectual property rights of the Reference Content belong to the OESA Platform or its original owner, and the Customer will not use it in any way that infringes the rights of the OESA Platform or the rights of third parties. The Reference Content shall be for Customers' reference only, and shall not be deemed as as any license, authorization, commitment or guarantee made by the Company for all or part of the Reference Content. Customers shall decide whether to use the Reference Content according to their own circumstances. Customers should guarantee the legality and compliance of using the Reference Content and bear the corresponding legal consequences.

page_name: 巨量千川数据推广服务协议
title: 9.3 任职申报​
page_url: 总知识库_cleaned/抖音电商规则中心/生态角色/巨量千川/巨量千川数据推广服务协议.html
summary: 本协议规定，如公司员工成为客户股东或高级管理人员，客户需立即通知公司法律部门，否则公司有权提前终止协议。这是为了确保公司利益。
text: 9.3 任职申报9.3 Declaration of Employment在本协议有效期内，如有任何本公司或本公司关联企业在职员工成为客户的股东或者高级管理人员，客户承诺立即书面通知本公司法律部门，否则本公司有权随时提前终止本协议而无需承担任何责任。If any in-service employee of the Company or its affiliates becomes a shareholder or officer of the Customer during the term hereof, the Customer undertakes to immediately notify the Legal Department of the Company in writing. Otherwise, the Company shall have the right to terminate the Agreement at any time in advance without any liability.

page_name: 巨量千川数据推广服务协议
title: 9.4 保护市场形象​
page_url: 总知识库_cleaned/抖音电商规则中心/生态角色/巨量千川/巨量千川数据推广服务协议.html
summary: 9.4 保护市场形象9.4 Protection of Market Image在本协议有效期内，双方不得损害对方整体市场形象，也不得从事其它损害对方利益的行为。During the validity period of this Agreement, either party shall not damage the other party’s overall market image, and
text: 9.4 保护市场形象9.4 Protection of Market Image在本协议有效期内，双方不得损害对方整体市场形象，也不得从事其它损害对方利益的行为。During the validity period of this Agreement, either party shall not damage the other party’s overall market image, and shall not engage in other acts that harm the other party’s interests.

page_name: 巨量千川数据推广服务协议
title: 9.5 文件，资质与客户方数据推广内容​
page_url: 总知识库_cleaned/抖音电商规则中心/生态角色/巨量千川/巨量千川数据推广服务协议.html
summary: 该文档是关于巨量千川平台对客户方数据推广内容的要求，包括：客户需保证提供的文件、资质和数据推广内容真实、准确、合法，且已取得充分授权，不欺骗或误导消费者，不违反法律、法规、规章制度规定，不包含有违公序良俗的内容或指向这些内容的信息，不构成或涉嫌不正当竞争行为，不侵犯任何第三方合法利益；客户方数据推广内容不应包含任何恶意软件、间谍软件或任何其他恶意代码，不应利用技术措施规避或变相违反任何法律法规或平台协议、规则。
text: 9.5 文件，资质与客户方数据推广内容9.5 Documents，Qualifications and the Customer's Marketing Materials（1）客户承诺其基于本协议向巨量千川平台提供的全部文件、资质和客户方数据推广内容真实、准确、合法，且已取得充分授权。客户应当确保客户方数据推广内容不欺骗或误导消费者，不违反法律、法规、规章制度规定，不包含有违公序良俗的内容或指向这些内容的信息，不构成或涉嫌不正当竞争行为，不侵犯任何第三方合法利益（包括但不限于侵犯他人著作权、商标权、专利权等知识产权，侵犯他人人身权或其他合法权益等）。（1）The Customer shall ensure that any and all documents, qualifications and the Customer's Marketing Materials provided to the OESA Platform under this Agreement are true, accurate, legitimate and duly authorized. The Customer shall ensure that the Customer's Marketing Materials do not deceive or mislead consumers, do not violate laws, regulations, rules and regulations, do not contain content that violates public order and good customs or information that points to such content, do not constitute or are not involved in unfair competition activities, and do not infringe any third party’s legal rights and interests (including but not limited to infringement of intellectual property rights such as copyrights, trademarks, and patents of others, infringement of personal rights or other legitimate rights and interests of others, etc.).（2）客户方数据推广内容不应包含任何恶意软件、间谍软件或任何其他恶意代码。客户方也不应利用技术措施规避或变相违反任何法律法规或平台协议、规则。（2）The Customer's Marketing Materials shall not contain any malware, spyware or any other malicious code in the data promotion. The Customer shall not circumvent or violate any laws and regulations, this Agreement and other rules and guidelines of the OESA Platform in disguise via technical measures.

page_name: 巨量千川数据推广服务协议
title: 9.6 合法合规承诺​
page_url: 总知识库_cleaned/抖音电商规则中心/生态角色/巨量千川/巨量千川数据推广服务协议.html
summary: 该文档规定，客户需承诺使用服务合法合规，不进行违法活动，同时强调公司设置的审核、治理、风控等机制不构成对客户行为和数据推广内容的合法合规性的承诺或担保，公司不承担连带责任，客户需自行承担法律后果。即运营策略是要求客户合法合规使用服务，公司不对此负责。
text: 9.6 合法合规承诺（1）客户承诺其使用本服务的行为合法合规，不会利用本服务从事任何违反法律法规的活动。The Customer warrants that any and all use of the Services shall comply with the laws and regulations, and the Customer shall not use the Service to engage in any activities that violate laws and regulations.（2）本公司配置的审核、治理、风控等机制不应被视作本公司对于客户使用本服务过程中的行为和客户方数据推广内容的合法合规性的任何承诺或担保。本公司不对客户或客户使用本服务过程中的行为承担任何连带责任，客户应独立承担其违法违规或不当行为的法律后果。The examination and verification, governance, risk control and other mechanisms configured by the Company shall not be deemed as any commitments or guarantees regarding the legality and compliance of the Customer's behavior in using the Services and the Customer's Marketing Materials. The Company shall not bear any joint and several liability regarding the Customer's behavior during the process of using the Services, and the Customer shall independently bear the legal consequences of its illegal or inappropriate behavior.

page_name: 巨量千川数据推广服务协议
title: 10.2 违约责任​
page_url: 总知识库_cleaned/抖音电商规则中心/生态角色/巨量千川/巨量千川数据推广服务协议.html
summary: 该文档为客户违约责任条款，规定了客户在违约情况下需承担的责任，包括赔偿损失、返回不合理利益、支付等额现金以及承担实现权利所产生的费用等。同时，如客户违约行为涉及违法行为、服务协议与规则或第三方合法权益的侵犯，客户需自行承担全部责任，并使平台免责。此外，公司有权在客户预付款、数据推广账户余额、保证金或关联平台账户余额中直接扣除客户应支付的费用、违约金、损失赔偿金等。如客户违约行为严重，公司有权暂停或解除与客户及客户关联方的合作。
text: 10.2 违约责任10.2 Liabilities for Breach如客户存在违约情形，应当承担如下违约责任。In the event of a Breach Event by the Customer, the Customer shall assume the following liabilities for breach.（1）本公司有权对客户账户采取全部或部分限制措施。（1）The Company shall be entitled to impose all or partial restrictive measures on the Customer's OESA account.（2）如客户违约情形导致本公司和/或本公司关联公司损失，或客户从本公司和/或本公司关联公司处获取不合理利益，客户应当赔偿损失或返还利益。如本公司和/或本公司关联公司损失，或客户从本公司和/或本公司关联公司处获取的不合理利益为流量资源，客户应当支付本公司相当于流量资源对应面额的等额现金。（2）If the Customer's Breach Event causes loss to the Company and/or its affiliated companies, or if the Customer obtains Unreasonable Benefits from the Company and/or its affiliated companies, the Customer shall compensate for the loss or return the Unreasonable Benefits. If the loss of the Company and/or its affiliated companies, or the Unreasonable Benefits obtained by the Customer from the Company and/or its affiliated companies are traffic resources, the Customer shall pay the Company an equivalent amount in cash corresponding to the face value of the traffic resources.（3）客户应当赔偿本公司和/或本公司关联公司为实现权利所产生的费用，包括但不限于调查费、差旅费、律师费、诉讼费、保全费、保全担保费或保全保险费等。（3）The Customer shall indemnify the Company and/or its affiliated companies for the costs incurred in realizing rights, including but not limited to investigation fees, travel expenses, attorney fees, litigation fees, security fees, security guarantee fees or security insurance fees.（4）如客户的违约情形违反法律法规，服务相关协议与规则或流量媒体方公示的各项协议与规则，或者侵害第三方合法权益，客户应当自行承担全部责任，并确保平台免责。如因此导致本公司以及流量媒体方损失，客户应向本公司以及流量媒体方足额赔偿该等损失（包括但不限于本公司向第三方的赔偿、向有权部门缴纳的罚款、诉讼费和合理的律师费等）。（4）If the Customer's Breach Event constitutes a violation of laws and regulations, the Service-related Agreements and rules, and the agreements and rules announced by the Traffic Media Providers, or an infringement upon the legitimate rights and interests of a third party, the Customer shall be solely responsible and ensure that the platform is exempt from liability. If such Breach Event causes losses to the Company and the Traffic Media Providers, the Customer shall fully compensate the Company and the Traffic Media Providers for such losses (including but not limited to the Company's compensation to third parties, fines paid to competent authorities, litigation fees and reasonable attorney fees).（5）本公司有权在客户预付款和数据推广账户余额（包括但不限于现金、赠款、消返红包、优惠券或其他可折算流量资源的权益）、保证金或客户在关联平台账户内的余额、保证金中直接先行扣除客户应当支付的推广服务费用、违约金、损失赔偿金、不合理收益和维权费用等，不足部分客户应当负责补足。（5）The Company shall be entitled to directly deduct the Promotion Service Fees payable, liquidated damages, compensation damages, Unreasonable Benefits and costs incurred for rights protection from the Customer's advance payment and the balance of the OESA Account (including but not limited to the cash, grants, red envelopes, coupon balances or other benefits that can be converted into traffic resources), deposit or balance in the Customer's accounts with the Affiliating Platforms, and the Customer shall continue to be liable for any deficiencies.（6）本公司和/或本公司关联公司有权基于客户违约行为的严重程度，暂停或解除与客户及客户关联方的合作，包括但不限于客户与巨量广告平台、巨量本地推平台和巨量星图平台的合作。（6）According to the severity of the Customer's breach of contract, the Company and/or its affiliates have the right to suspend or terminate the cooperation with the Customer and its affiliates, including but not limited to the cooperation between the Customer and the Ocean Engine Advertising Platform, the Ocean Engine Local Ads Platform and the Ocean Engine Xingtu Platform.

page_name: 巨量千川数据推广服务协议
title: 11.1 责任限制​
page_url: 总知识库_cleaned/抖音电商规则中心/生态角色/巨量千川/巨量千川数据推广服务协议.html
summary: 这是一份关于责任限制和服务的协议。该公司将按照“错一补一”、“漏一补一”的原则为客户的数据推广提供同等价值资源补偿，同时，该公司会尽最大努力向客户提供具有连贯性和安全性的服务，但不能保证服务毫无瑕疵。客户同意，若服务存在瑕疵，但上述瑕疵是当时行业技术水平所无法避免的或者公司无法预见的，且公司尽全力弥补客户损失，则公司不视为违约。如果公司违反协议，造成客户实际损失，应赔偿客户直接可计算的实际损失，但最高额不超过违约行为所涉及订单金额的20%。
text: 11.1 责任限制11.1 Limitation of Liabilities（1）若因本公司过错造成约定的数据推广内容出现错投、漏投情形，本公司将按照“错一补一”、“漏一补一”的原则为客户的数据推广提供同等价值资源补偿，客户同意，本公司提供补偿后，豁免本公司任何其他责任。（1）In the event that agreed Customer's Marketing Materials are displayed with errors or omissions due to the default of the Company, the Company will provide the Customer with resources compensation of equal value according to the principle of "one replacement for one mistake/omission". The Customer agrees to exempt the Company from any other responsibilities after the Company provides the compensation.（2）本服务是按照现有技术和条件所能达到的现状提供的。本公司以及流量媒体方会尽最大努力向客户提供具有连贯性和安全性的服务；但不能保证服务毫无瑕疵，也无法随时预见和防范法律、技术以及其他风险，包括但不限于不可抗力、病毒、木马、黑客攻击、系统不稳定、系统漏洞、第三方服务瑕疵、政府行为等原因可能导致的服务中断、数据丢失、服务器/系统延迟以及其他的损失和风险。客户进一步同意，若本公司以及流量媒体方提供的服务存在瑕疵，但上述瑕疵是当时行业技术水平所无法避免的或者本公司以及流量媒体方无法预见的，且本公司以及流量媒体方尽全力弥补客户损失，为客户提供服务，其将不被视为本公司以及流量媒体方违约，同时，由此给客户造成的财产，数据或信息丢失等损失的，客户同意放弃追究本公司以及流量媒体方的责任。（2）The Services are provided on an "AS-IS" basis with available technologies and conditions. The Company and the Traffic Media Provider will do their best to provide consistent and secure services to the Customer; However, they may not guarantee that the Services are without any default or can not, at any time, foresee and prevent legal, technical and other risks, including but not limited to possible service interruption, data loss, server/system delay and other losses and risks caused byforce majeure, virus, Trojan horse, hacker attack, system instability, system vulnerability, third-party service defect, government behavior. The Customer futher agrees that if the Services provided by the Company and theTraffic Media Provider are defective, and the aforesaid defects are unavoidable by the technology of the industry at that time or cannot be foreseen by the Company and the Traffic Media Provider , and the Company and the Traffic Media Provider have made all efforts to make up for the Customer’s losses and provide services to the Customer, the Company and the Traffic Media Provider shall not be deemed to be in violation of the Agreement. The Customer agrees to waive the liability of the Company and the Traffic Media Provider for any losses of property, data or information caused by the above-mentioned circumstances.（3）如本公司违反本协议约定，给客户造成实际损失，应赔偿客户直接可计算的实际损失，但本公司支付违约金和/或赔偿金的最高额不超过违约行为所涉及订单金额的20%。（3）If the Company violates the Agreement and causes actual loss to the Customer, the Company shall compensate the Customer for the directly calculable actual loss, but the maximum amount of liquidated damages and/or compensation paid by the Company shall not exceed 20% of the amount of the orders relating to the breach of contract.

page_name: 巨量千川数据推广服务协议
title: 11.2 不可抗力与情势变更​
page_url: 总知识库_cleaned/抖音电商规则中心/生态角色/巨量千川/巨量千川数据推广服务协议.html
summary: 本文档主要阐述了在不可抗力或情势变更情况下，运营策略或平台规则的相关规定。客户需理解并接受，若因不可抗力或情势变更导致部分或全部迟延或不能履行义务，不承担违约责任，但需及时采取措施减少损失。不可抗力包括但不限于政府管制、国家政策调整等，情势变更包括服务器终止等。如发生上述情况，公司及其关联方将在12小时内通知客户。若不可抗力事件或情势变更持续20日或累计超过30日，可单方提前解除或终止协议。
text: 11.2 不可抗力与情势变更11.2Force majeureand changes of circumstances本公司、本公司关联公司以及流量媒体方负责本服务及服务数据查询系统的开发运营和维护，并尽最大努力保持本服务和系统服务的连续性和稳定性，但客户理解并接受：客户或本公司、本公司关联公司以及流量媒体方因不可抗力或情势变更导致部分或全部迟延或不能履行义务的，不承担违约责任，但应及时采取措施减少因不可抗力或情势变更造成的损失。不可抗力包括但不限于政府管制、国家政策调整、恐怖袭击、黑客攻击、系统漏洞、自然灾害、战争、停电、电信部门技术调整以及病毒入侵等。下列事项为本协议约定的情势变更：The Company, its affiliates and the Traffic Media Provider shall be responsible for the development, operation and maintenance of the services and service data inquiry system, and shall make best efforts to maintain the continuity and stability of the Services and system services. However, the Customer understands and accepts that if the Customer or the Company, the Company’s affiliates and the Traffic Media Provider delay or fail in performing their obligations in part or in whole due to force majeure or change of circumstances, the Customer or the Company shall not be liable for breach of contract. However, the OESA Platform shall take measures in time to reduce the losses caused by force majeure or change of circumstances.Force majeureincludes but is not limited to government control, adjustment of national policies, terrorist attacks, hacker attacks, system vulnerabilities, natural disasters, wars, power cuts, technical adjustment of telecommunications sector and virus intrusion. The following matters are changes of circumstances agreed in the Agreement:（1）服务器终止。如发生如下情况时，本公司以及流量媒体方可以不经通知客户，中止提供平台的信息发布及本服务：(1) Server termination. In case of any of the following circumstances, the Company and the Traffic Media Provider may suspend the provision of information release and the Services without notifying the Customer:i. 紧急服务设备维护、检修等非人为因素造成的不可抗拒情况。I. Irresistible conditions caused by non-human factors such as maintenance and repair of emergency service equipment.ii. 基础电信业务故障。II. Failure of basic telecommunication service.iii. 平台的线路服务终止的情况。III. Termination of the line service of the platform.对于上述情形，本公司以及流量媒体方将于该情形发生后12小时内通知客户。In case of the above-mentioned circumstances, the Company and theTraffic Media Provider shall notify the Customer within 12 hours after the occurrence.（2）因本公司以及流量媒体方服务器遭遇不法攻击导致临时性不能正常运行且经本公司以及流量媒体方尽力抢修仍无法恢复使用。(2) The servers of the Company and the Traffic Media Provider temporarily fail to operate normally due to illegal attacks, and the servers still cannot be restored for use after the Company and the Traffic Media Provider make every effort to repair them.（3）其他在本协议成立以后发生的当事人在订立协议时无法预见的、非不可抗力造成的客观情况的重大变化。(3) Other material changes in the objective circumstances that cannot be foreseen by the parties when concluding the Agreement and are not caused by force majeure after the conclusion of the Agreement.如不可抗力事件或情势变更持续20日或在本协议有效期内累计超过30日，则任何一方有权以书面通知的方式单方提前解除或终止本协议。If the event of force majeure or change of circumstances lasts for 20 days or exceeds 30 days during the term of the Agreement, either party shall have the right to unilaterally terminate or terminate the Agreement in advance upon written notice.

page_name: 巨量千川数据推广服务协议
title: 11.3 其他免责情形​
page_url: 总知识库_cleaned/抖音电商规则中心/生态角色/巨量千川/巨量千川数据推广服务协议.html
summary: 其他免责情形：平台有权调整规则，如导致服务不能按约定提供不承担违约责任；为提供更好服务，有权定期检修、维护、升级设备，如导致服务中断或中止，客户需放弃追究责任；如发生特殊情况，如有权部门要求、社会事件等，可调整、暂停或终止服务，不承担违约责任；如因无法按约提供服务，应在情况结束后以原约定条件继续提供，如无法提供则根据实际履行的部分结算。客户展示机会竞价成功后，如因展示状态异常、硬件设备问题等导致推广内容未能成功展示，不构成本公司违约，不承担责任，客户无权要求退款。
text: 11.3 其他免责情形11.3 Other Disclaimer（1）平台为维护市场整体利益、遵循流量媒体方要求、优化数据推广服务和基于经营需求进行业务调整，变更平台规则和本服务相关协议与规则，可能会对本协议项下数据推广服务内容、服务方式、版面布局、页面设计等进行调整、限制、变更或下线，如因此导致本协议项下的数据推广服务不能按约定或者不能继续提供，本公司不承担违约责任。（1）In order to maintain the overall interests of the market, comply with the requirements of the Traffic Media Providers, optimize the Services and make adjustments based on business needs, the platform may change Platform Rules and Relevant Rules, and may modify, restrict, adjust or terminate the content, forms, layout and page design of the Services, which may cause the Company's failure to provide the Services as agreed. Under such circumstances, the Company shall not be liable for breach of contract.（2）为了向客户提供更完善的服务，本公司、本公司关联公司以及流量媒体方有权定期或不定期地对平台或相关设备进行检修、维护、升级等，此类情况可能会造成相关服务在合理时间内中断或中止，若由此给客户造成损失，客户同意放弃追究本公司、本公司关联公司以及流量媒体方的责任。（2）To provide better services to the Customer, the Company, its affiliates and the Traffic Media Provider shall have the right to regularly or irregularly repair, maintain and upgrade the platforms or relevant equipment. In the event that such circumstances result in interruption or suspension of the relevant services within a reasonable period of time, the Customer agrees to waive the liability of the Company, its affiliates and the Traffic Media Provider in case of any loss thereby caused to the Customer.（3）如发生包括但不限于有权部门要求、社会公共事件、媒体报道或重大时间节点等情形时，本公司有权在相应时间节点调整、暂停或终止本协议项下的数据推广服务且无需承担违约责任。（3）In the event of circumstances including but not limited to the requirements of competent authorities, social public events, media reports or key time points, the Company has the right to adjust, suspend or terminate the Services under the Agreement at the corresponding time period without being liable for breach of contract.（4）如本公司因上述情形无法如约提供数据推广服务，应在上述情形结束后，以不低于原双方约定条件继续提供服务，如本公司基于实际情况无法继续提供服务，双方应根据实际履行的部分进行结算。（4）If the Company fails to provide the Services as agreed due to the above circumstances, it shall proceed with the Services on conditions not lower than the original agreement with the Customer after the above circumstances are over. If the Company can't provide the Services due to the current situation, the Company and the Customer shall settle according to the actual performance.（5）当客户就展示机会竞价成功并产生计费数据时，如客户方数据推广内容的展示状态异常，客户方或网络终端用户的软硬件设备、网络配置存在问题，或网络终端用户自行对其网络终端设备（如手机、电脑等）、客户端应用程序、网站、小程序等进行设置或操作而导致客户方数据推广内容未能成功展示，不构成本公司违约。如发生前述情形，本公司不承担任何责任，客户亦无权要求本公司退还已收取的推广服务费。（5）When the Customer successfully bids for an impression opportunity, which generates billing data, any failure to display the Customer's Marketing Materials caused byabnormal display status of the Customer's Marketing Materials, the Customer's or the network end users' software and hardware equipment and network configuration issues, the network terminal users' personal settings or operations on their network terminal equipment (such as mobile phones, computers, etc.), applications, websites, mini programs, etc., shall not constitute a breach of contract by the Company. In the event of such circumstances, the Company shall not assume any responsibility and the Customer shall not be entitled to request a refund for the Promotion Service Fee collected.

page_name: 巨量千川数据推广服务协议
title: 14.1 协议组成​
page_url: 总知识库_cleaned/抖音电商规则中心/生态角色/巨量千川/巨量千川数据推广服务协议.html
summary: 14.1 协议组成14.1 Components of the Agreement本协议包括巨量千川平台根据具体的产品与功能不时发布的相关协议和平台规则，以及附件一《个人信息保护承诺函》。This Agreement shall contain any and all agreements and Platform Rules released by the OESA Platform accor
text: 14.1 协议组成14.1 Components of the Agreement本协议包括巨量千川平台根据具体的产品与功能不时发布的相关协议和平台规则，以及附件一《个人信息保护承诺函》。This Agreement shall contain any and all agreements and Platform Rules released by the OESA Platform according to specified products or functions, and theAppendix I: Commitment to Personal Information Protection.

page_name: 巨量千川数据推广服务协议
title: 14.2 可转让性​
page_url: 总知识库_cleaned/抖音电商规则中心/生态角色/巨量千川/巨量千川数据推广服务协议.html
summary: 这是一份关于平台运营规则的协议，主要内容包括：1. 未经同意，不得转让权利义务关系；2. 运营主体和域名变更时，原协议权利义务关系概括转移至变更后的运营主体和/或平台域名；3. 公司有权委托第三方服务提供商提供咨询、诊断和优化建议服务，且第三方服务提供商只能在其委托范围内向客户提供服务，无权向客户收取任何费用；4. 客户有权向公司提交投诉，如第三方服务存在履约瑕疵。
text: 14.2 可转让性14.2 Assignability未经一方同意，另一方不可将本协议下的权利义务关系转让给第三方；但是，本公司有权在下述情形发生时，将本协议下的权利义务关系中的全部或部分转让至第三方。Without the consent of one party, the other party shall not transfer the rights and obligations to the other party, except that the Company shall be entitled to transfer all or part of the rights and obligations to a third-party.（1）运营主体与域名变更。巨量千川平台及其关联平台（包括但不限于抖店平台、巨量百应平台和精选联盟平台）可能基于业务调整、国家法律法规更新和政策变化等，变更运营主体和/或平台域名。如该等变更发生，客户原已签署的协议中与巨量千川平台和/或其关联平台相关的权利义务关系，将概括转移至变更后的运营主体和/或平台域名。（1）Change of Operating Entity and Domain Name. Adjustment of Operating Entity and Domain Name. OESA Platform and its Affiliating Platforms (including but not limited to Doudian Platform, Ocean Engine Buyin Platform and Premium Affiliate Platform) may change the operating entity and/or platform domain name based on business adjustments, updates of national laws and regulations, and policy changes. In the event that such change occurs, the rights and obligations in the agreements executed with OESA Platform and/or its Affiliating Platforms shall be transferred to the changed operating entity and/or platform domain name.（2）本公司有权经提前5天通知，将本协议下的权利义务关系中的全部或部分（包括本协议中的所有权利、所有权、利益、利益以及义务和责任）转让至本公司的关联公司。（2）The Company shall have the right to assign this Agreement (including all of its rights, titles, benefits, interests, and obligations and duties in this Agreement) to any Affiliates of the Company with 5 days' notice in advance.（3）本公司有权委托第三方服务提供商向客户提供本协议下部分涉及账户运营、数据推广和产品使用相关的咨询、诊断和优化建议服务（“第三方服务”）。如本公司委托第三方服务提供商提供第三方服务，将提前以站内信或后台弹窗等方式通知客户，并充分披露第三方服务信息。第三方服务提供商仅可在平台披露的授权范围内向客户提供服务，无权向客户收取任何费用。为第三方服务提供商在其委托范围内向客户提供服务之必要，客户授权第三方服务商提供商通过本公司提供的系统或接口访问其服务数据。如第三方服务存在履约瑕疵，客户有权向本公司提交投诉。（3）The Company shall be entitled to entrust a third-party service provider to provide the Customer with certain part of the services under this Agreement including but not limited to consulting, diagnosis and optimization suggestions related to account operations, data promotion and product use under this Agreement ("Third Party Services") on behalf of the Company. ). If the company entrusts a third-party service provider to provide third-party services, it will notify customers 7 days in advance through an in-site message or a background pop-up window, and fully disclose the third-party service information. Third-party service providers can only provide services to customers within the scope of authorization disclosed by the platform and have no right to charge customers any fees. If it is necessary for a third party to provide services to the customer within the scope of its entrustment, the customer authorizes the third party to access its service data through the system or interface provided by the company. If there are defects in the performance of third-party services, the customer shall be entitled to submit a complaint to the company.

page_name: 巨量千川数据推广服务协议
title: 14.3 反商业贿赂​
page_url: 总知识库_cleaned/抖音电商规则中心/生态角色/巨量千川/巨量千川数据推广服务协议.html
summary: 该文档为反商业贿赂条款，规定了相关方在合作中不得要求、接收、承诺或提供与合作有关的账外佣金、不当馈赠等财物或其他利益，若发现涉嫌不当行为，应在合理时间内告知对方。若一方违约，守约方有权立即终止协议，追偿损失，列入黑名单，禁止或部分限制合作，并通过渠道公开违约行为。违约方应自行承担违反反腐败法律的全部责任。
text: 14.3 反商业贿赂14.3 Anti-Commercial-Bribery（1）在本协议及任何其他合作中，任何一方及其关联公司、各自的股东、董事、监事、高管、员工、及代表任一方行事的其他主体（例如委托代理人、咨询顾问、服务提供商）（统称“相关方”）均不得向或从另一方或其关联公司的任何员工或任何其他人员要求、收受、承诺或提供任何与对应合作有关的账外佣金、不当馈赠等财物或其他利益。(1) In this agreement and any other cooperation, neither party and its affiliated companies, their respective shareholders, directors, supervisors, senior management, employees, and other entities acting on behalf of either party (such as authorized agents, consultants, service providers) (collectively referred to as "Affiliating Parties") shall demand, receive, promise or provide any off-book commissions, improper gifts and other property or other benefits related to the corresponding cooperation from or to any employee of the other party or any other person.（2）任何一方若发现任何与本协议有关的涉嫌收受或提供该等财物或其他不当利益的行为，应在知晓不当行为的合理时间内将该等行为告知另一方。（2） If either party identifies any act suspected of receiving or providing such property or other improper benefits related to this agreement, it shall inform the other party of such act within a reasonable time upon knowing the improper act.（3）双方同意，在本协议签订前或本协议合作期间内，任何一方或其关联公司若存在任何不遵守或部分不遵守上述条款的行为（该方下称“违约方”），或在另一方（该方下称“守约方”）调查过程中不积极配合调查或故意隐瞒相关信息，则该等行为应被视为本协议下的重大违约，守约方有权：（a）以通知方式立即单方面终止本协议且无需支付本协议相关的任何款项，并向违约方追偿一切损失；（b）将违约方列入黑名单，并全面禁止或部分限制与违约方及其关联公司的全部或部分现有及未来合作，包括但不限于本协议项下的合作；（c）通过守约方的渠道向社会公开违约方的违约行为。（3）Both parties agree that before the signing of this agreement or during the cooperation period of this agreement, if either party or its affiliated company has any act of not complying with or partially not complying with the above clauses (such party, "Breaching Party"), or does not actively cooperate in the investigation of the other party (hereinafter referred to as the "Observing Party") or deliberately conceals relevant information during the investigation process, such act shall be regarded as a material breach under this agreement, and the Observing party shall be entitled to: （a）unilaterally terminate this agreement immediately by notice without the need to pay any amount related to this agreement, and recover all losses from the Breaching Party; （b）list the Breaching Party in the blacklist and completely prohibit or partially restrict all or part of the existing and future cooperation with the Breaching Party and its affiliated companies, including but not limited to the cooperation under this agreement; （c）disclose the Breaching Party's breach of contract to the public through the channels of the Observing Party.（4）违约方及其相关方应自行承担违反所适用的反腐败法律的全部责任，且不得从事任何可能导致守约方及其相关方承担该等法律责任的行为。（4）The Breaching Party and its Affiliating Parties in violation of this clause shall bear all the responsibilities for violating the applicable anti-corruption laws by themselves and shall not engage in any act that may cause the Observing Party and its Affiliating Parties to bear such legal responsibilities.

page_name: 巨量千川数据推广服务协议
title: 14.4 贸易合规​
page_url: 总知识库_cleaned/抖音电商规则中心/生态角色/巨量千川/巨量千川数据推广服务协议.html
summary: 这是一份贸易合规的协议，要求双方遵守所有适用的制裁和出口管制相关法律法规。如果由于贸易合规原因导致任何一方无法继续在合法合规的前提下履行本协议，双方应协同寻求解决方案，或者协商解除本协议。同时，如果任何一方违反任何适用的贸易合规规定，导致继续履行本协议将违反适用的贸易合规要求，则另一方有权不再履行本协议相关义务，且违反方将赔偿另一方因上述违规所遭受的所有损失。
text: 14.4 贸易合规14.4 Trade Compliance（1）双方同意，在基于本合同合作过程中，将遵守所有适用的制裁和出口管制相关法律法规（合称“贸易合规”）要求。(1) Each party agrees that, during the cooperation based on this contract, it will comply with all applicable laws, regulations and requirements related to sanction and export control (collectively referred to as "trade compliance").（2）双方同意，如果由于贸易合规原因导致任何一方无法继续在合法合规的前提下履行本协议，双方应协同寻求解决方案，或者协商解除本协议。(2) Each party agrees that if any party is unable to continue to perform this agreement on the premise of legality and compliance due to trade compliance reasons, both parties shall jointly seek a solution or negotiate to terminate this agreement.（3）在不限制前款规定的前提下，如果任何一方违反任何适用的贸易合规规定，导致继续履行本协议将违反适用的贸易合规要求，则另一方有权不再履行本协议相关义务，且违反方将赔偿另一方因上述违规所遭受的所有损失。(3) Without limiting the provisions of the preceding paragraph, if any party violates any applicable trade compliance regulations and the continued performance of this agreement would violate the applicable trade compliance requirements, the other party shall have the right to no longer perform the relevant obligations of this agreement, and the violating party shall compensate the other party for all losses suffered by the other party due to the above violations.

page_name: 巨量千川数据推广服务协议
title: 14.5 管辖​
page_url: 总知识库_cleaned/抖音电商规则中心/生态角色/巨量千川/巨量千川数据推广服务协议.html
summary: 本协议主要规定了协议的管辖权和解决争议的方式，即本协议的订立、执行和解释及争议的解决均应适用我国大陆地区法律，签署地点为北京海淀区，且任何与公司发生的争议，都应提交北京海淀区法院诉讼解决。
text: 14.5 管辖14.5 Governing Law and Jurisdiction本协议的订立、执行和解释及争议的解决均应适用中华人民共和国大陆地区法律。本协议的签署地点为北京市海淀区，若客户与本公司发生争议的，双方同意将争议提交北京市海淀区法院诉讼解决。The conclusion, execution and interpretation of the Agreement and the resolution of disputes shall be governed by the laws of the mainland of the People’s Republic of China.The Agreement is signed in Haidian District, Beijing. In case of any dispute between the Customer and the Company, both parties agree to submit the dispute to the court of Haidian District, Beijing for resolution.

page_name: 巨量千川数据推广服务协议
title: 14.6 可分割​
page_url: 总知识库_cleaned/抖音电商规则中心/生态角色/巨量千川/巨量千川数据推广服务协议.html
summary: 该文档中的14.6节讨论了协议中条款的效力问题，如果某个条款因违反法律、政府规定或其他原因而无效或不具有执行力，那么这个条款将被删除，但不会影响整个协议的法律效力。
text: 14.6 可分割14.6 Severability如果本协议中的任何条款因违反法律或政府规定或因其他原因而完全或部分无效或不具有执行力，则该条款被视为删除。但该条款的删除不影响本协议同其他条款的法律效力。If any provision hereof is wholly or partially invalid or unenforceable due to violation of law or governmental regulations or other reasons, such provision shall be deemed to be deleted. However, the deletion of the provision shall not affect the legal effect of the Agreement and other provisions.

page_name: 巨量千川数据推广服务协议
title: 14.7 保密​
page_url: 总知识库_cleaned/抖音电商规则中心/生态角色/巨量千川/巨量千川数据推广服务协议.html
summary: 本协议规定，任何一方在未得到另一方书面同意的情况下，不能向任何人或实体披露专有信息。本协议的终止、解除、撤销或无效不影响保密条款的有效性和对双方的约束力。
text: 14.7 保密14.7 Confidentiality（1）一方因订立及履行本协议所知悉、了解到的对方的任何信息为对方当事人的专有信息。未经信息披露相对方事先书面同意，任何一方将对任何专有信息保密，不得向任何人或实体披露这些专有信息。但正常履行本协议的义务需要或者国家法律、法规另有规定的除外。未经对方事先书面同意，任何一方不得将双方的合作及本协议的具体内容披露给任何第三方（本公司关联公司和流量媒体方除外）。（1）Any information of the other party known or learned by one party due to the conclusion and performance of the Agreement shall be the proprietary information of the other party. Either party shall keep the proprietary information confidential, and neither party shall disclose such proprietary information to any person or entity without the prior written consent of the other party unless required by the normal performance of the obligations hereunder or otherwise provided by national laws and regulations. Without the prior written consent of the other party, neither party shall disclose the cooperation between the parties and the specific contents hereof to any third party (except the Company’s affiliates and theTraffic Media Providers).（2）本协议的终止、解除、撤销或无效均不影响本保密条款的有效性及对双方的约束力。（2）The termination, dissolution, revocation or invalidity of the Agreement shall not affect the validity of this confidentiality clause and its binding force on both parties.

title: 14.8 版本​
page_url: 总知识库_cleaned/抖音电商规则中心/生态角色/巨量千川/巨量千川数据推广服务协议.html
summary: 14.8版本协议存在多语言版本，歧义时以中文为准。客户可自行登陆平台账户下载打印纸质版协议，纸质版应与电子版内容完全一致，如有不一致之处，以电子产品为准。
text: 14.8 版本14.8 Versions（1）本协议可能存在多语言翻译版本，如存在任何歧义，以中文版本为准。（1）The agreement may have a multi-language translation version. If there is any inconsistency between the Chinese and multi-language versions, the Chinese version shall prevail.（2）客户如需取得本协议的纸质版，可自行登陆客户平台账户并下载打印协议，客户打印的纸质版协议应与本协议的电子版内容完全一致，如有不一致之处，以本协议的电子版为准。（2）In the event that the Customer need a printed copy of the Agreement, the Customer may log in its OESA Account and download the Agreement for printing. The printed copy of the Agreement shall be consistent with the online version of this Agreement. In case of any discrepancy, the online version shall prevail.

text: 1.在本承诺函项下客户对个人信息的处理，应符合数据保护要求的规定，严格遵守个人信息处理的合法、正当、必要和诚信原则，且仅在为实现《巨量千川数据推广服务协议》（以下简称“主协议”）的范围内进行相应的处理活动。客户在处理个人信息过程中，应当遵循公开、透明原则，向相关数据主体公开个人信息处理规则，明示处理的目的、方式和范围，数据处理应具有明确、合理的目的，并应当与处理目的直接相关且在实现处理目的所需的最小范围内进行。数据处理应当在数据主体的授权范围内、采取对数据主体个人权益影响最小的方式进行，并应避免因个人信息不准确、不完整对数据主体权益造成不利影响。若超出数据主体的授权范围对相关个人信息进行处理的，客户应当根据数据保护要求的规定，另行征得相关数据主体的授权同意后进行处理，数据保护要求另有规定的除外。

page_name: 巨量千川数据推广服务协议
title: 1. The Customer may only process Personal Inform
page_url: 总知识库_cleaned/抖音电商规则中心/生态角色/巨量千川/巨量千川数据推广服务协议.html
summary: 该文档规定了客户处理个人信息的策略。客户必须遵守法律规定和数据保护要求，以完成 master agreement 履行。在处理个人信息时，客户需要透明公开地向相关数据主体披露信息处理原则、目的、方式和范围。只有与目的直接相关的数据才会被处理到最小程度，且数据处理应在数据主体的授权和同意下进行，以最小化对个人权利的影响，防止不准确和缺失的信息对权利产生负面影响。在处理超出了数据主体授权范围的个人信息之前，客户需要按照数据保护要求获得他们的授权和同意。
text: 1. The Customer may only process Personal Information hereunder to the extent required to fulfill the OESA Data Promotion Service Agreement (hereinafter referred to as "Master Agreement") in strict compliance with Data Protection Requirements and the principles of legality， legitimacy， necessity and integrity. During Personal Information Processing， the Customer shall disclose Personal Information Processing principles， purpose， manner and scope to involved data subjects in line with the principles of openness and transparency. With a clear and reasonable purpose， only the data directly relating to the purpose shall be processed to the minimum extent. The data shall be processed within the scope of authorization of data subjects， in a manner to minimize the impact on their personal rights and to avoid their rights from being adversely impacted by information inaccuracy and incompleteness. Prior to processing Personal Information beyond the scope of authorization of data subjects， the Customer shall obtain their authorization and consents in accordance with Data Protection Requirements， unless otherwise specified in Data Protection Requirements.

text: 2.若涉及客户向平台传输个人信息，客户承诺在传输相关个人信息前，须符合数据保护要求的规定。除非数据保护要求另有规定，客户承诺已经就其向平台传输的个人信息，将所涉及的个人信息的种类、处理目的、处理方式等数据保护要求所规定的法定内容对数据主体进行了充分且满足透明度要求的告知，并获得了数据主体的授权同意。

Unless otherwise specified in Data Protection Requirements， the Customer shall inform the data subjects of the statutory contents set out in Data Protection Requirements， including the information types as well as processing purpose and manner relating to the transfer of Personal Information to the Platform， with prior authorization and consents from the data subjects.
