text: 3.客户承诺向平台上传相关个人信息并使用主协议项下的数据推广服务，不会违反数据保护要求以及客户与本公司相关协议/合同（如有）的约定，不会损害本公司、本公司关联方、相关数据主体或对数据拥有相关权利的主体的合法权益，亦不会超出数据主体或对数据拥有相关权利的主体针对客户的相关处理事宜已向客户及任何其他相关方授权同意的范围。若客户违反本条规定，应当负责赔偿相关行为对本公司、本公司关联方及数据主体造成的侵害，并承担全部责任。

text: 3. The Customer shall upload relevant Personal Information to the platform and use the Service under the Master Agreement in accordance with Data Protection Requirements and relevant agreement/contract， if any， between the Customer and the Company， without harming the legal interests of the Company， its affiliates， involved data subjects or the subjects having relevant rights in the data or exceeding the authorization and consents granted by the data subjects or the subjects having relevant rights in the data to the Customer and any other interested party with respect to the processing by the Customer. In case of breach of this clause， the Customer shall compensate for the infringement on the Company， its affiliates and involved data subjects， and shall bear all the responsibilities arising therefrom.

text: 4.若基于数据推广服务合作的必要，涉及客户从平台获取相关个人信息，客户承诺将按照数据保护要求、在数据主体授权范围内以及本公司和平台设定的安全规则/政策，在主协议的范围内处理相关个人信息并须严格确保相关个人信息的安全。除主协议另有约定外，未经本公司书面许可，客户不得将相关个人信息处理活动分包给任何第三方进行处理。受限于本条规定，客户应对第三方的数据处理活动承担全部责任。本条所规定的个人信息处理活动结束后，除非法律法规另有规定，客户应当及时删除相关个人信息。

To download relevant Personal Information from the Platform， as necessary for the Service cooperation， the Customer shall process the information within the scope of the Master Agreement and the scope of authorization of the data subjects in accordance with Data Protection Requirements and the security rules/policies set by the Company and the platform， and strictly secure the information. Unless otherwise agreed in the Master Agreement， the Customer shall not subcontract Personal Information Processing to any third party without the written consent of the Company. Subject to this clause， the Customer shall be fully responsible for the data processing of such third party. Upon the completion of Personal Information Processing set out herein， the Customer shall timely delete relevant information.

text: 5.客户承诺，除非获得本公司书面同意且严格受限于数据保护要求、数据主体的授权范围以及主协议的目的范围，客户不会向第三方共享、提供、转让或公开披露相关个人信息，亦不会对相关个人信息进行超出上述范围的进一步处理。受限于本条规定，若确需向第三方传输相关个人信息的，客户承诺此类处理行为不会违反数据保护要求以及客户与本公司相关协议/合同（如有）的约定，不会损害本公司、本公司关联方、相关数据主体或对数据拥有相关权利的主体的合法权益，亦不会超出数据主体或对数据拥有相关权利的主体针对客户的相关处理事宜已向客户及任何其他相关方授权同意的范围，客户将严格约束第三方的处理行为并确保个人信息的安全。若客户违反本条规定，应当负责赔偿相关行为对本公司、本公司关联方及数据主体造成的侵害，并承担全部责任。

page_url: 总知识库_cleaned/抖音电商规则中心/生态角色/巨量千川/巨量千川数据推广服务协议.html
summary:
该文档规定，在未获得公司书面同意的情况下，客户不得向任何第三方分享、提供、转移或披露相关个人信息，或超出数据保护要求、数据主体授权范围和 master 协议目的范围处理信息。客户在需要向第三方转移相关个人信息时，需保证 processing 不会违反数据保护要求和相关协议/合同，且不会损害公司及其关联公司、涉及数据主体的合法权益或超出数据主体或相关权利人给予客户及其其他利益相关者的处理授权和同意。违反此规定，客户需赔偿对公司的侵权行为，并承担由此产生的所有责任。

核心要点：客户在未获得公司书面同意的情况下，不得向第三方分享、提供、转移或披露个人信息，且需保证 processing 符合数据保护要求和相关协议/合同，不会损害公司及其关联公司和涉及数据主体的合法权益。违反规定，客户需赔偿对公司的侵权行为，并承担由此产生的所有责任。
text: 5. Without the written consent of the Company， the Customer shall not share with or offer， transfer or disclose relevant Personal Information to any third party， or further process the information beyond Data Protection Requirements， the scope of authorization of the data subjects， and the purpose scope of the Master Agreement. Subject to this clause， in case of a need to transfer relevant Personal Information to any third party， the Customer shall warrant that such processing will not violate Data Protection Requirements and relevant agreement/contract， if any， between the Customer and the Company， or harm the legal interests of the Company， its affiliates， involved data subjects or the subjects having relevant rights in the data， or exceed the authorization and consent granted by the data subjects or the subjects having relevant rights in the data to the Customer and any other interested party with respect to the processing by the Customer， and the Customer shall strictly constrain the processing of the third party and ensure the security of Personal Information. In case of breach of this clause， the Customer shall compensate for the infringement on the Company， its affiliates and involved data subjects， and shall bear all the responsibilities arising therefrom.

text: 6.在数据推广合作过程中，客户可能使用本公司或本公司关联方为其提供的相关技术服务（例如建站服务），客户知悉并确认，若相关技术服务涉及在本公司或本公司关联方的任何平台/产品或其他场景收集或进一步处理本公司或本公司关联方用户/客户的个人信息，客户应当确保相关处理行为完全符合数据保护要求的规定，包括但不限于：客户应当根据数据保护要求的规定向相关数据主体提供客户隐私政策或类似文件，向其告知所处理的数据类型、处理目的、方式等数据保护要求规定的法定内容，并获得相关数据主体的授权同意，同时应提供客户真实有效的联系方式，便于相关数据主体行使数据保护要求项下的相关权利。

title: 6. During the data promotion cooperation， when u
page_url: 总知识库_cleaned/抖音电商规则中心/生态角色/巨量千川/巨量千川数据推广服务协议.html
summary: 该文档规定，在数据推广合作期间，使用公司或其关联方提供的相关技术服务（如网站建设服务），若涉及公司或其关联方在平台/产品或其他场景中收集或进一步处理用户/客户的个人信息，则客户需确保相关处理符合数据保护要求，包括提供隐私政策或类似文件、通知数据主体 statutory内容（包括信息类型、处理目的和方式）、获得数据主体的授权和同意、提供真实有效的联系方式，以便数据主体根据数据保护要求行使权利。核心要点是强调运营策略需遵循数据保护要求，确保用户数据安全。
text: 6. During the data promotion cooperation， when using relevant technical services provided by the Company or its affiliates (such as website construction service)， if the services involve the collection or further Personal Information Processing of the users/clients of the Company or its affiliates in any platform/product or other scenarios of the Company or its affiliates， the Customer shall ensure that relevant processing is in full compliance with Data Protection Requirements， including but not limited to the following: providing involved data subjects with the privacy policy or similar documents of the Customer as provided in Data Protection Requirements; informing such data subjects of the statutory contents set out in Data Protection Requirements， including the information types as well as the processing purpose and manner; obtaining authorization and consents from involved data subjects; making available its true and valid contact information so that involved data subjects may exercise their rights under Data Protection Requirements.

text: 为了实现广告请求以及广告素材的返回与展示，特定场景下客户与本公司会通过API等技术手段传输相关广告请求数据，包括经过哈希或其他安全措施处理的设备唯一标识符、IP、请求ID、时间戳、用户操作系统类型等（简称为“广告请求数据”）。客户应当确保对于所接收的上述广告请求数据，仅可用于实现主协议目的，未经本公司书面许可，不得用于任何其他目的，亦不得向任何其他第三方、关联方共享或进行公开披露。在实现上述协议目的后，除非客户所接收的广告请求数据与客户原本即拥有的相关用户数据重合，客户应当及时删除相关广告请求数据。对于客户对前述重合数据的处理行为，客户应当确保数据处理符合法律法规的规定并持续在用户授权范围内进行处理。

summary: 该文档规定了客户和公司之间在广告请求和展示方面的数据传输方式，要求客户通过安全措施（如哈希）加密广告请求数据，并在特定场景下使用API。客户需确保这些广告请求数据仅用于实现 master 协议目的，不得用于其他目的、共享或披露给其他第三方和 affiliate，除非公司书面同意。客户需及时删除满足条件的广告请求数据， overlapping data 需遵守法律法规并在用户授权范围内处理。
text: In order to achieve the advertisement request as well as the return and display of the advertisement materials， the Customer and the Company will transfer relevant advertisement request data， including the device UID， IP， request ID， timestamp and type of user operating system processed through hash or other security measures(hereinafter referred to as "Advertisement Request Data")， through technical means such as API under certain scenarios. The Customer shall ensure that the aforesaid Advertisement Request Data received will only be used to achieve the purpose of the Master Agreement， and will not be used for any other purpose， shared with， or disclosed to any other third party and affiliates without the written consent of the Company. After achieving the aforesaid purpose， the Customer shall timely delete relevant Advertisement Request Data， unless overlapped with the Customer's existing user data. The Customer shall ensure that the aforesaid overlapping data is processed in compliance with the laws and regulations and within the scope of authorization of users.

text: 为了实现广告监测目的，客户与本公司将通过监测链接等技术方式，对所投放的广告进行监测与归因。即客户在创建广告计划的同时配置广告监测链接、监测代码或采取其他技术方式，当相关用户被广告素材曝光或与广告素材有其他互动时，将通过上述技术方式相关监测数据回传给客户或第三方监测机构。监测场景下涉及的数据包括经过哈希或其他安全措施处理的设备唯一标识符、IP、请求ID、时间戳、用户操作系统类型、用户粗略地理位置等（简称为“监测数据”）。客户应当确保对于所接收的上述监测数据，仅可用于实现广告监测与归因的目的，未经本公司书面许可，不得用于任何其他目的，亦不得向任何其他第三方、关联方共享或进行公开披露。在实现广告监测与归因目的或合作终止后，客户应当及时删除相关监测数据。若客户委托第三方监测公司进行监测，则客户应当在上述目的实现后，督促其委托的第三方监测机构履行上述义务。

summary: 该文档阐述了广告监测的实现方式，即客户和公司通过技术手段如监控链接来监测和归因广告。客户在创建广告计划时需配置广告监测链接或其他技术手段。用户在接触广告材料或互动时，相关监测数据将通过上述技术手段反馈给客户或第三方监测机构。这些数据包括设备UID、IP、请求ID、时间戳、用户操作系统类型和用户粗略地理位置等。客户需确保这些监测数据仅用于广告监测和归因，不得用于其他目的，或未经公司书面同意，共享或披露给其他第三方和 affiliate。合作终止或广告监测归因目的实现后，客户应及时删除相关监测数据。如果客户雇佣第三方监测公司，则在实现监测目的后，客户需监督第三方监测公司履行相应义务。
text: In order to achieve advertisement monitoring， the Customer and the Company will monitor and attribute the placed advertisements through the technical means such as monitoring link. Namely， the Customer shall configure an advertisement monitoring link， monitoring code or other technical means when creating the advertisement plan. When a user is exposed by the advertisement materials or interacts with the advertisement materials， relevant monitoring data will be passed back to the Customer or the third-party monitoring agency through the above technical means. The data involved under the monitoring scenario includes the device UID， IP， request ID， timestamp， type of user operating system and user rough geographical location processed through hash or other security measures(hereinafter referred to as "Monitoring Data"). The Customer shall ensure that the aforesaid Monitoring Data received will only be used to achieve the purpose of advertisement monitoring and attribution， and will not be used for any other purpose， or shared with， or disclosed to any other third party and affiliates without the written consent of the Company. Upon the achievement of the advertisement monitoring and attribution purpose or termination of the cooperation， the Customer shall timely delete relevant Monitoring Data. If the Customer engages a third-party monitoring company for monitoring， the Customer shall， upon the achievement of the aforesaid purpose， supervise the third-party monitoring company to perform the aforesaid obligations.

text: 9.本公司提供数据推广服务的宗旨之一，是对受众人群提供适当的广告和推广服务，并为相关客户提供产品/服务的推广渠道，而不是对相关受众人群的具体真实身份进行不当挖掘和侵扰，因此本公司不允许使用反映受众真实身份的个人信息或标签类别（如姓名、身份证号）。同时，本公司不希望客户利用受众人群的困境，通过数据推广服务方式而获取进一步的商业利益，因此本公司不允许使用与数据主体个人困境相关的个人信息或标签类别对个人权利产生侵害或不公正对待。此外，受到社会偏见和歧视影响的受众人群在获取信息方面可能会受到负面的连锁影响，并无法获得公平的对待，因此本公司不允许使用带有偏见和歧视性的个人信息或标签，并基于此将特定类别的产品或服务依据上述个人信息或标签使用数据推广服务。若客户违反本条规定，应当负责赔偿相关行为对本公司、本公司关联方及数据主体造成的侵害，并承担全部责任。

title: 9. One of the purposes for the Company to provid

summary:
公司提供服务旨在为观众提供适当的广告和推广服务，为相关客户提供产品/服务推广渠道，禁止利用用户个人信息或标签（如姓名和身份证号）侵犯观众隐私，禁止利用观众困境谋取进一步利益，禁止使用针对数据主体的偏见和歧视性个人信息或标签，或根据上述个人信息或标签针对特定产品或服务应用服务。违反此规定，用户需赔偿公司、关联方和涉及数据主体的侵权行为，并承担由此产生的所有责任。

核心要点：公司服务旨在提供广告推广和产品推广渠道，禁止利用用户个人信息和标签侵犯隐私，禁止利用观众困境谋取利益，禁止使用偏见和歧视性个人信息或标签，并禁止针对特定产品或服务应用服务。如有违反，用户需承担相应责任。
text: 9. One of the purposes for the Company to provide the Service is to provide the audiences with appropriate advertisement and promotion services and to offer product/service promotion channels to relevant customers， instead of improperly mining and invading the real identities of relevant audiences. The Company， therefore， prohibits the use of Personal Information or label categories (such as name and ID card number) that reflect the identities of the audiences. The Customer is also not expected to exploit the dilemma of the audiences to obtain further business interests through the Service. The Company， therefore， prohibits the use of Personal Information or label categories related to the personal dilemma of the data subjects to infringe on or unfairly treat the personal rights. In addition， the audiences subject to social bias and discrimination may be negatively affected in obtaining the information and cannot get fair treatment. The Company， therefore， prohibits the use of biased and discriminatory Personal Information or labels， or the application of the Service to specific products or services based on the aforesaid Personal Information or labels. In case of breach of this clause， the Customer shall compensate for the infringement on the Company， its affiliates and involved data subjects， and shall bear all the responsibilities arising therefrom.

text: 12. The Customer shall have necessary organization management systems and technical measures set out in Data Protection Requirements to guarantee the security of Personal Information. In case of actual or possible Personal Information security incident (disclosure， destruction， manipulation， loss， unauthorized access and Personal Information Processing as well as infringement of relevant rights of the data subjects arising therefrom)， the Customer shall immediately notify the Company in writing and take effective remedies immediately. If an aforesaid Personal Information security incident occurs for reasons attributable to the Customer， the Customer shall independently resolve any disputes (including without limitation complaints， administrative penalties， and litigation disputes) arising therefrom， to avoid any infringement and loss to the Company， its affiliates and involved data subjects， and assume all liabilities thereof.

page_url: 总知识库_cleaned/抖音电商规则中心/生态角色/巨量千川/巨量千川数据推广服务协议.html
summary: Doudian Platform allows merchants to register a store and authorize OESA to access their authentication, qualification and bank account verification information for account registration. The OESA Account establishes a relationship with the Doudian Store and the Douyin Store, allowing access through the Official Douyin Account of the Store and the Douyin Account of the Store. The authorization and binding relationship between the Official Douyin Account of the Store and the Douyin Account of the Store is terminated when it's terminated, but data and promotion orders before termination are not affected.
text: （2）In the event that the Customer has registered a store on Doudian Platform ("Doudian Store"), the Customer, deemed as in the role of a "Merchant", shall authorize OESA to obtain and review the authentication entity information, qualification information and bank account verification information of the Doudian Store, which will be submitted to register an OESA Account in the role of a "Merchant". The OESA Account shall establish an authorization and binding relationship with the Doudian Store, and the Douyin account that has been or will be bound with the Doudian Store through the Doudian Store & Douyin Account Integration Process (such account, the "Official Douyin Account of the Store"), based on which, the Customer or any authorized third parties may access and operate the OESA Account via the Official Douyin Account of the Store and the Douyin Account of the Store, as well as access relevant data of the Official Douyin Account of the Store and the Douyin Account of the Store via the OESA Account, or access relevant data of the OESA Account via the Official Douyin Account of the Store and the Douyin Account. Once the authorization and binding relationship between the Official Douyin Account of the Store and the Douyin Account of the Store is terminated, the authorization and binding relationship between the Douyin Account of the Store and the OESA Account will be terminated accordingly; however, any and all relevant data obtained and promotion orders submitted before the termination shall not be affected.

text: （3）In the event that the Customer has registered an account with Ocean Engine Buyin Platform (such account, a "Buyin Account") and authenticated as "Creator" or "MCN", the Customer shall authorize OESA to obtain and review the authentication entity information, qualification information and bank account verification information of the Buyin Account, which will be submitted to register an OESA Account in the role of a "Creator" or an "MCN". summary:
该文档规定，非商家、创作者或MCN的客户通过抖音账号申请OESA账户时，需授权OESA获取并审查抖音账号的认证实体信息。客户了解并同意OESA账户与抖音账号之间建立绑定关系，基于此授权和绑定关系，客户或授权第三方通过抖音账号访问和操作OESA账户，以及通过OESA账户访问抖音账号相关数据。

总结：客户需授权OESA获取抖音认证实体信息，并与抖音账号建立绑定关系，以实现通过抖音账号访问和操作OESA账户和访问抖音账号相关数据。
text: （4）In the event that a Customer, who is not a Merchant, a Creator or an MCN, applies for an OESA Account via a Douyin Account, the Customer shall authorize OESA to obtain and review the authentication entity information of the Douyin Account. The Customer understands and agrees to authorize the OESA Account to be bound with the Douyin Account, and based on the authorization and binding relationship, the Customer or any authorized third party may access and operate the OESA Account via the Douyin Account, as well as access relevant data of the Douyin Account via the OESA Account.

page_url: 总知识库_cleaned/抖音电商规则中心/生态角色/巨量千川/巨量千川数据推广服务协议.html
summary:
【核心要点】
该文档规定，除非书面另有约定，客户需承认大东店/购买账户的认证信息需与OESA账户保持一致，这是 validly registered OESA账户的必要条件。如果OESA识别到任何认证信息的不一致性，OESA有权采取管理措施，包括对OESA账户实施限制性措施，修复实体信息异常展示，要求客户重新上传相关资质。

【运营策略或平台规则】
该文档规定了客户需将大东店/购买账户的认证信息与OESA账户保持一致，这是注册OESA账户的必要条件。若认证信息有 inconsistency，OESA有权采取管理措施，包括对OESA账户实施限制性措施。
text: （5）Unless otherwise agreed in writing, the Customer shall acknowledge that the authentication information of the Doudian Store/Buyin Account shall be consistent with the OESA Account, which constitutes one of the premises of a validly registered OESA Account. In the event that OESA identifies any inconsistency of the authentication information, OESA shall be entitled to take management measures, including but not limited to imposing Restrictive Measures on the OESA Account, fixing the abnormal display of entity information and requiring the Customer to re-upload relevant qualifications.

text: （1）当客户为商家角色时，客户已有的或未来拥有的店铺抖音号，默认成为其自行注册的首个巨量千川账户的“官方抖音号”。其他场景下，客户或客户授权的营销服务商注册巨量千川账户时使用的抖音号，将成为该账户的官方抖音号。客户也可在服务相关协议与规则允许的范围内，操作一个符合条件的抖音号与巨量千川账户建立“官方授权”关系，成为该巨量千川账户的“官方抖音号”。基于官方授权，官方抖音号有权登录、访问、操作和注销该巨量千川账户，巨量千川账户也取得如下所述授权。

title: (1) With the role of a "Merchant"， the Customer'
page_url: 总知识库_cleaned/抖音电商规则中心/生态角色/巨量千川/巨量千川数据推广服务协议.html
summary: 该文档解释了当用户担任“商家”角色时，其现有的或未来的店铺抖音账号将默认为客户第一个注册的“官方抖音账号”。在其他情况下，客户或经客户授权的营销服务提供商在注册OESA账号时所使用的抖音账号将默认为OESA账号的“官方抖音账号”。客户可在服务相关协议和规则的范围内，操作符合条件的抖音账号与OESA账号建立“官方授权”关系，成为OESA账号的“官方抖音账号”。基于官方授权，官方抖音账号可以登录、访问、操作和关闭OESA账号，OESA账号获得以下授权。
text: (1) With the role of a "Merchant"， the Customer's existing or future Official Douyin Account of the Store will by default become the "Official Douyin Account" of the first OESA Account registered by the Customer. In other scenarios， the Douyin account used by the Customer or the Marketing Service Provider authorized by the Customer when registering the OESA Account shall be the "Official Douyin Account" of the OESA Account. The Customer may， within the scope permitted by the Service-related Agreements and Rules, operate a qualified Douyin Account to establish an "Official Authorization" relationship with an OESA Account, and become the "Official Douyin account" of the OESA Account. Based on the Official Authorization， the Official Douyin Account can log in, access, operate and close the OESA Account, and the OESA Account obtains the following authorizations.

summary: （3）推广素材授权。基于官方授权，客户在使用本服务时，有权使用官方抖音号在“抖音”软件及相关服务上传、发布或传输的内容（包括但不限文字，图片，视频，音频、直播等各种形式的内容及其中包括的音乐、声音、台词、视觉设计、对话等所有组成部分）进行信息网络传播，用于包括但不限于品牌、产品、活动的营销、宣传、推广等商业用途。为避免疑义，客户理解并同意，上述授予的权利包括使用、复制和展示该抖音号拥有或被许可使用
text: （3）推广素材授权。基于官方授权，客户在使用本服务时，有权使用官方抖音号在“抖音”软件及相关服务上传、发布或传输的内容（包括但不限文字，图片，视频，音频、直播等各种形式的内容及其中包括的音乐、声音、台词、视觉设计、对话等所有组成部分）进行信息网络传播，用于包括但不限于品牌、产品、活动的营销、宣传、推广等商业用途。为避免疑义，客户理解并同意，上述授予的权利包括使用、复制和展示该抖音号拥有或被许可使用并植入内容中的个人形象、肖像、姓名、商标、服务标志、品牌、名称、标识和公司标记（如有）以及任何其他品牌、营销或推广资产、物料、素材等的权利和许可。

page_url: 总知识库_cleaned/抖音电商规则中心/生态角色/巨量千川/巨量千川数据推广服务协议.html
summary: 该文档主要讲述了抖音平台对于营销材料的使用规定。用户在接收服务过程中，有权使用平台上上传、发布或传输的内容，用于商业目的，如宣传品牌、产品、活动等，并使用这些授权内容来推广直播间。用户需理解并同意，所授予的权利包括使用、复制和展示个人形象、肖像、姓名、商标、服务标志、品牌、名称、标志等抖音账户拥有的或获得授权的内容。
text: （3）Authorization of Marketing Materials. Based on the Official Authorization, during the process of receiving the Services, the Customer is entitled to use the contents uploaded, released or transmitted through the Douyin Account on Douyin and related services (including but not limited to texts, pictures, videos, audios, live broadcasts and other forms of contents as well as all their components including music, sound, lines, visual design, dialogue, etc.) to transmit information on the Internet for commercial purposes including but not limited to marketing, publicity and promotion of brands, products and events, as well as use the authorized content to promote the live room. For the avoidance of doubt, the Customer understands and agrees that, the rights granted above include the rights and licenses to use, reproduce and display personal images, portraits, names, trademarks, service marks, brands, names, logos and company logos (if any), any other branding, marketing or promotional assets, supplies, materials, etc. that the Douyin Account owns or is licensed to use and embed in the contents.

text: （4）数据授权。基于官方授权，客户有权通过巨量千川账户查看官方抖音号在商业性活动中产生的数据,包括短视频/直播的相关数据（包括但不限于观看量、加入粉丝团人数、评论量、分享量等相关聚合维度数据），以及抖音号主页的相关数据（包括但不限于主页内关注数、访问量、主页橱窗访问量），短视频/直播内容如涉及客户的商品的相关数据（包括商品点击量、商品下单量、商品订单量、商品订单金额等数据）以及基于前述数据进行分析的相关转化率等衍生数据。客户知悉并同意，官方授权终止后，本条所述授权内容已被巨量千川用户查看、使用或保存的部分，将继续保留在巨量千川账户内，不必执行任何过滤、屏蔽或删除操作。

page_url: 总知识库_cleaned/抖音电商规则中心/生态角色/巨量千川/巨量千川数据推广服务协议.html
summary: 该文档主要说明用户在商业活动中，基于官方授权，可以访问官方抖音账号生成的相关数据，包括短视频/直播数据、主页数据、商品相关数据以及分析数据等。官方授权终止后，已查看、使用或保存的用户数据可在OESA平台账户中保存，无需过滤、删除或删除。运营策略是充分利用用户数据，进行商业活动。
text: （4）Authorization of Data. Based on the Official Authorization, the Customer is entitled to access relevant data generated by the Official Douyin Account during commercial activities, including relevant data of short videos/live broadcasts (including but not limited to the number of views, the number of people who join the fan club, the number of comments, the number of reposts and other relevant aggregated data), relevant data of the home page of the Douyin Account (including but not limited to the number of followers of the home page, the number of visits, and the number of visits to the home page window), relevant data of short video/live broadcast contents concerning the commodities of the Customer (including the number of clicks, the number of order placing, the number of orders and the order amount, etc.) and derivative data such as conversion rate that are analyzed based on the above data. After the Official Authorization is terminated, the authorized contents already viewed, used or saved by the Customer can be kept in the OESA Platform Account without any filtering, removal or deletion measures imposed.

summary:
【主要信息】用户若使用抖音账号登录“Ocean Engine Buyin Platform”，且该抖音账号已开立OESA Platform账户，则授权其OESA Platform账户与“Ocean Engine Buyin Platform”账户绑定。用户可通过“Ocean Engine Buyin Platform”直接访问OESA Platform，使用OESA Platform的各种服务，查看广告投放等信息。

【核心要点】用户抖音账号与OESA Platform账户绑定，直接使用OESA Platform服务。
text: (1) If you log in the Ocean Engine Buyin Platform with a Douyin Account and the Douyin Account has opened an OESA Platform Account, you authorize your OESA Platform Account to be bound with the Ocean Engine Buyin Account. You can directly access the OESA Platform through the Ocean Engine Buyin Platform, so that you can use the OESA Platform’s various services and view data information such as the information on advertisement placement.

text: （2）当您为达人或商家时，如您使用抖音号登录巨量百应平台，并点击巨量百应平台提供的巨量千川平台登录入口，以申请开通巨量千川账户，使用巨量千川平台的各项服务和查看数据推广相关数据，您理解并同意，您的上述的操作表明您同意授权巨量百应平台将您用于登录巨量百应平台的抖音号信息共享至巨量千川平台，以便巨量千川平台核验您的身份。您理解并同意，为核验您的身份，确认您是否符合账号开通条件，以及根据您的情况优化为您提供的服务，巨量千川平台还将向抖店平台核实您指定的抖音号是否已绑定正常经营的店铺账号，和/或向精选联盟平台核实您是否完成精选联盟平台相关账户的身份信息认证。如经核验后发现您的抖音号尚未在巨量千川平台上完成注册，您授权巨量千川平台获取您的抖音号信息并生成后续页面操作提示，您应根据提示完成申请开通巨量千川账户操作。

title: （2）If you are an influencer or a merchant, when
page_url: 总知识库_cleaned/抖音电商规则中心/生态角色/巨量千川/巨量千川数据推广服务协议.html
summary: 该文档说明， influencer 和商家在登录“Ocean Engine Buyin Platform”时，需使用 Douyin 账户登录，并点击“OESA Platform login portal”，申请注册 OESA Platform 账户。在此过程中，将共享 Douyin 账户信息以验证身份，并使用 OESA Platform 的服务查看广告投放相关数据。为优化服务，OESA Platform 将与 Doudian Platform 检查指定的 Douyin 账户是否已与 Doudian Platform 店铺账户绑定，以及与 Premium Affiliate Platform 检查是否完成了相关账户身份信息的验证。若验证后发现未注册 OESA Platform，则授权平台获取 Douyin 账户信息并生成后续页面的在线指南。
text: （2）If you are an influencer or a merchant, when you log in the Ocean Engine Buyin Platform with a Douyin Account and click the OESA Platform login portal provided by the Ocean Engine Buyin Platform to apply for registering an OESA Platform Account, use various services of the OESA Platform and view relevant data on advertisement placement, you understand and agree that your above operation indicates that you agree to authorize Ocean Engine Buyin Platform to share your Douyin Account information for logging in Ocean Engine Buyin Platform with OESA Platform, so that the OESA Platform can verify your identity. You understand and agree that, in order to verify your identity, confirm whether you meet the conditions for registering an account, and optimize the services provided to you based on your situation, the OESA Platform will also check with the Doudian Platform whether the Douyin Account you designated has been bound to a Doudian Platform store account in normal operating status, and/or check with the Premium Affiliate Platform whether you have completed the authentication of the identity information of the Premium Affiliate Platform-related account. If it is found after verification that your Douyin Account has not been registered with the OESA Platform, you authorize the platform to obtain your Douyin Account information and generate online instructions in subsequent pages. You shall complete the application for registering an OESA Platform Account according to the instructions.

text: （3）当您为机构时，如您点击巨量百应平台提供的巨量千川平台登录入口，以申请开通巨量千川账户，使用巨量千川平台的各项服务和查看广告投放相关数据，并根据后续页面提示使用符合巨量千川平台约定条件的抖音号（“指定抖音号”）申请以百应机构账户的认证主体名义开通巨量千川账户，您理解并同意，您的上述的操作表明您同意授权巨量百应平台将您的巨量百应账户信息和指定抖音号信息共享至巨量千川平台，以便巨量千川平台核验您的身份。您理解并同意，为核验您的身份，确认您是否符合账号开通条件，以及根据您的情况优化为您提供的服务，巨量千川平台还将向抖店平台核实您的巨量百应账户的认证主体是否已绑定正常经营的店铺账号，和/或您的指定抖音号是否已绑定正常经营的店铺账号，和/或向精选联盟平台核实您的指定抖音号是否完成精选联盟平台相关账户的身份信息认证。如经核验后发现您的指定抖音号符合开通巨量千川账户的条件，您授权巨量千川平台获取您的巨量百应账户信息和指定抖音号信息（包括但不限于头像、昵称信息）并生成后续页面操作提示，您应根据提示完成申请开通巨量千川账户操作。

title: （3）If you are an institution, when you click the
page_url: 总知识库_cleaned/抖音电商规则中心/生态角色/巨量千川/巨量千川数据推广服务协议.html
summary: 该文档说明，在使用OESA Platform申请注册OESA Platform账户时，需使用平台提供的服务，并在符合OESA Platform规定的情况下使用指定的抖音账号申请注册。在后续页面上，用户需同意授权OESA Platform共享其OESA Platform账户和指定抖音账号的信息，以便OESA Platform验证用户身份。为优化服务，OESA Platform还将与大东平台检查用户抖音账号的正常运营实体是否已绑定到东东平台店铺账户，以及指定抖音账号是否已绑定到店铺的正常运营账户。若经验证，用户指定的抖音账号符合注册OESA Platform账户的条件，则授权OESA Platform获取其OESA Platform账户和指定抖音账号（包括但不限于头像和昵称信息）并生成后续页面的在线指南。用户需按照后续页面的指示完成注册。
text: （3）If you are an institution, when you click the OESA Platform login portal provided by the Ocean Engine Buyin Platform to apply for registering an OESA Platform Account, use various services of the OESA Platform and view relevant data on advertisement placement and use the Douyin Account in compliance with the agreed terms of the OESA Platform (the “Designated Douyin Account”) to apply for registering an OESA Platform Account in the name of the certified subject of the Buyin institution account according to the instructions on subsequent pages, you understand and agree that your above operation indicates that you agree to authorize the Ocean Engine Buyin Platform to share your Ocean Engine Buyin Account information and the Designated Douyin Account information with OESA Platform so that the OESA Platform can verify your identity. You understand and agree that, in order to verify your identity, confirm whether you meet the conditions for registering an account, and optimize the services provided to you based on your situation, the OESA Platform will also check with the Doudian Platform whether the authenticated entity of your Ocean Engine Buyin Account has been bound to a Doudian Platform store account in normal operating status, and/or whether Designated Douyin Account has been bound to the account of the store in normal operation, and/or verify with the Premium Affiliate Platform whether you have completed the authentication of the identity information of the Premium Affiliate Platform-related account. If it is found after verification that your designated Douyin Account meets the conditions for registering an OESA Platform Account, you authorize the OESA Platform to obtain your Ocean Engine Buyin Account information and your Designated Douyin Account information (including but not limited to profile and nickname information) and generate online instructions in subsequent pages. You shall complete the application for registering an OESA Platform Account according to the instructions.
